Reviews.Title: “clean hotel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: tcm9
Reviews.Content: we booked two ocean view rooms in september, the rooms were clean,smelled fresh and everything worked as it should (shower,fridge, etc), the staff was friendly and helpful. the front desk in the morning ( a gentleman with a beard) and in the evening ( a young black lady with a great personality) were both friendly and helpful with good local info (restaurants and such) the maid did a good job with our rooms and was also friendly. the only improvements i can sugest is more shade areas by the pool as the sun is very strong at midday and a better breakfast (toast,cereal,milk,tea). we enjoyed our stay and will return to this hotel when in daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Staff and location great; ants not so much”
Reviews.Author: pdx_photoman
Reviews.Content: Emerald Shores is an oceanfront hotel in Daytona Beach Shores. It is rather dated, but the location is beautiful and the prices reasonable. Apart from the location, the most outstanding feature is the courtesy and friendliness of the staff, who, without exception, go out of your way to make your stay a pleasant one. The continental breakfast consists of coffee, orange juice, and cellophane wrapped, sugary baked products. Skip it and head down Atlantic Avenue to the Cracked Egg. Our room was infested with sugar ants, and though the maintenance staff supposedly made a visit to spray for them, it made no difference, and they got into everything. If you are looking for location and friendly service at a good price and can get by without the extras, this is worth a visit. We'll look elsewhere next time in town. There is no fitness room and no restaurant, nor is there a place to eat within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing weekend”
Reviews.Author: Gia B
Reviews.Content: Just what we needed. Big rooms, Cool staff, Right on the beach, amazing views. more of a family hotel. Can't comment on the breakfast because we slept through it. Still a Great value. Only thing i would change is the no alcohol after 2am law they have lol

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL!!!”
Reviews.Author: Tracey N
Reviews.Content: I have been to many hotels in the past in Daytona area, this hotel by far was the best!! Very Clean..GREAT staff...You feel very welcome as soon as you enter the door** The pool and spa was great for all ages and having the ocean just steps away from the pool area made it so nice for the children. They did express breakfast was snack type, such as pop tarts and muffins, to me for the price...the great staff, very very clean rooms, clean everywhere...it was perfect****I know that this is place my family will always come back to***Thank you!!!! Mount Dora, Fl

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs up for this "simple" beachfront hotel!”
Reviews.Author: hotelsrfunforus
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a quiet, simple, uncluttered, no-frill hotel, this is perfect for you. The price was reasonable and parking was free. Breakfast was juice, coffee, poptarts and Little Debbie breakfast bars, again, simple! The other reviews are very accurate. Looks like the future is bright for this property and the owners should begin to start investing in upgrades of bedding and curtains. Very quiet compared to the North end of Daytona. The beach front view is worth the money. We took beautiful pictures at sunrise. Overheard one guest chewing out staff about garbage but it wasn't necessary. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience at Emeral Shores”
Reviews.Author: maryj867
Reviews.Content: Great experience! The room and lobby were very clean. All of the staff were very friendly and efficient. Beautiful ocean view. We had some air conditioning trouble and the maintance man was right on it. Installed a new unit within an hour of report.

Reviews.Title: “Needs updates”
Reviews.Author: MsJennyBear
Reviews.Content: Great location! Near most of the condos that the locals live in so the beach wasnt crowed at all. Nor were the restaurants in the area. The rooms could us some upgrading, new pillows and such. Sheets were stained. They looked clean but just needed thrown out. Everything else was cleaned well. overall it was an average hotel. VERY friendly staff and great location with ocean front rooms at a great price! Our room wasn't ready upon our arrival so we received an upgrade which was very nice. We would consider going back

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: chevelletodd72
Reviews.Content: Wanted to get away for a few days and decided to book here. The hotel says its newly conditioned. Check in was quick and the women at the desk were always funny and helpful. The hotel is clean and taken care of. The room had a oceanfront view and was large and had a kitchenette. The bathroom was large too. The pool is a little small and can get crowded on weekends. Some of the chairs are a little worn but overall the pool area is nice. There is a public walkway and ramp to the beach next to the hotel. My wife is in a wheelchair so it was really nice to have that option since the beach car ramps were closed during high tide and we couldn't drive down on the beach. Will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful beach locaton”
Reviews.Author: fmgard
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff. This is a great beach hotel with large rooms. Please disregard the negative comments about emerald shores. It is a great place for the money. The only valid comments are about the breakfast. Coffee, juice, and store pastries. Everything else is great.

Reviews.Title: “Well worth the $$ and accurately described on the webpage”
Reviews.Author: kbtoys928
Reviews.Content: Hotel is clean and on the quiet side of Daytona - toward Daytona Shores. We visit Daytona every other weekend and our usual hotel was booked when made the last minute decision to take a long weekend. I looked through the Tripadvisor reviews and selected Emerald Shores Hotel. Check-in was quick and the staff very friendly and accomodating. Switched our room, not at our request, to a higher level for a better view. There is no tiki bar or pumping loud music poolside so if you are looking for that type of stay, you will be disappointed. But for a relaxing and convenient location with plenty of pool chairs, umbrellas and easy access to the beach right outside your room door, this is your hotel. Room was larger than we had anticipated and the full refrigerator and stovetop kitchen area was nice to have for our snacks and to fix up our evening meals. The pool and hot tub were clean and they provided pool towels for your convenience. The one thing that was not as expected was their continental breakfast. Orange juice, coffee, and packaged pop parts, cinnamon rolls, donut sticks and pecan rolls was all they offered. It was ok with me because there was a 7'11 right across the street that had everything we needed and we walked right across the street, to the pool table and began our day. We have already made reservations for August and September to go back. This is our new hotel of choice.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Kbely, Hlavni Mesto Praha, Czech Republic
Reviews.Title: “Cheap hotel, average services.”
Reviews.Author: Ondrej B
Reviews.Content: We had this hotel twice during my business trips from Europe. Average hotel for average price. Nothing excellent but nothing special. Comfortable swimming pool and nice jakkuzi outside, but be careful, who was there before you. For staying for few nights during business - perfect. Holiday - not for me.

Reviews.Title: “My experience at Emerald shores hotel”
Reviews.Author: Yulia02
Reviews.Content: I choose Emerald shores based on the reviews of the previous customers and it seems that we were in different places than those that liked it. Personal in the venue is actually nice, but they don't know any information other than about their hotel. For example, when I asked about nearby malls they couldn't tell me anything, but since there is a free internet in the lobby it wasn't a problem to find this information. The worst part is the room where we stayed. Within 3 days I killed 4 roaches. I don't think this is the activity that people on the vacation should spend their time on. Bed sheets were grey in color and not white and they actually smelled with cigarets. Good thing is that in every room you have a small kitchen where you can prepare tea or coffee in the morning or you can even make a small meal. Another good feature of this hotel is a small pool which is heated in winters and jacuzzi, which you can ask to be switched on. All together I wouldn't recommend this place, because of the room condition. Jacuzzi and pool can not make you feel better with laying in a smelly bed.

Reviews.Title: “THEY CANCELED WITHOUT TELLING US”
Reviews.Author: Ann Marie B
Reviews.Content: Emerald shores canceled our reservation before we got there and did not let us know !!!!! So when we got there a bit early, went to see if the res was ok and things good....they were not !!!!!!! THEY TOLD US IT WAS CANCELED AND THERE WAS NOTHINGTHEY COULD DO !!!!! THAT WAS IT....NO HELP ..NO LET ME SEE IF THERE IS ANOTHER ROOM...NO NOTHING....THIS WAS THE MANAGER !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “It was ok but ...”
Reviews.Author: ML0NG
Reviews.Content: It was ok but if it wasn't for Kansha I would have put poor. We there in room 808 12-15th of July. Place was clean, priced good for area, room average. Now we had no house keeping at all the first day. Dunno why? No sign on door. We called at 1pm and told the front desk.... still no house keeping, no towels or anything. Got back to our room at 8pmish, and talked to Kansha and she hooked us up with everything that we needed. She didn't make us seem like a burden at all. We had some special request and she made sure we were took care of. If all hotels had a whole staffing of Kansha's all the hotels would be great. If we deside to stay here again we will be making sure she is there, if not I won't be staying here. The rest of the people were ok but seemed like they could have really cared less. Breakfast sucked. Place was quiet (I liked that).

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at the Emerald Shores”
Reviews.Author: Lee E
Reviews.Content: We recently spent 4 nights and 5 days at the Emerald Shores hotel. The hotel was very clean and the rooms very large. The pool was kept clean. I saw the gentleman perform the maintenance every day. Just steps to the beach. Beautiful oceanfront view. The staff was wonderful and made us feel very welcome, especially Stacey and Kanesha. There were plenty of pool towels and the computer with free printing in the lobby helped with quick directions. Housekeeping (Casandra) took good care of our room daily. Sherrine also went out of her way to help us. My kids had a great first experience at the ocean. Thanks for the great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good, but not great for two reasons.”
Reviews.Author: GatorRaceFan
Reviews.Content: I liked that this hotel was smaller than alot of others on the beach. Not a long wait for a crowded elevator, or too many people in the pool or hot tub to enjoy it. The desk clerks were friendly, and check in/out was a very speedy organized procedure. Housekeeping was also friendly and thorough when it came to taking care of our room. However our room (7th floor) advertised as "Riverview" was facing the direction of the Halifax River, BUT it was mostly a view of A1A/Atlantic Avenue, the buildings across the street, and a tiny sliver of the river in the distance. The advertised item I was most disappointed in was the Continental Breakfast. This consisted of Pop Tarts, and snack cakes, limit 2 per person, and juice and coffee. Given the actual definition of the phrase Continental Breakfast, this was not false advertising. But was definitely starting the day on a weak note. I would still recommend this hotel. The price was pretty reasonable, especially for a place on the beach the weekend after the 4th, and a BIG race weekend.

Reviews.Title: “We will be returning again next year. Can't wait!”
Reviews.Author: Darlene V
Reviews.Content: We've stayed here 4 times now and plan on returning next year. Staff always makes us feel right at home. Stacy, Kenesha and Robert were all very helpful with any questions etc. Barry always makes sure everything runs smoothly. This is right on the ocean and the view is out of this world. We had a balcony which we used each night & morning. Great place to take long walks on beautiful beach. Rooms are always clean. Pool is always sparkling. Lots of great places to eat nearby. Feels like home to us.

Reviews.Title: “Expected much more for the price”
Reviews.Author: Prelude402
Reviews.Content: We stayed here as an alternative to New Smyrna Beach because of limited availability there due to a bicycle event that weekend. The reviews sounded pretty positive so decided to try it at $139 per night. We could not believe how sparsely the room was furnished! No closet door (it was actually just an alcove with hangers), no luggage stand, no bathroom amenities, an old television, the worst shower head ever, and a king bed mattress that sloped down on the sides. The sole redeeming quality in my opinion was being located directly on the ocean. If you have low standards this place will be fine, but otherwise steer clear!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Lee E
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed for 4 nights and 5 days. The room was large and looked directly out to the ocean. They even gave us a free upgrade. The pool was clean and in chemical balance. I saw this being done every day. Right on the beach. Housekeeping kept our room spotless and they were very friendly. Stacy and Kanesha at the front desk are super friendly and always helpful. Continental breakfast is poptarts. I am a working mother, my kids are used to poptarts in the morning so we had no issues there. Computer and free printing in the lobby where great for printing mapquest directions quickly. The manager was always on site and visible if you had any problems (which we didn't). Thank you all for making my kids first visit to the ocean perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay - beautiful view”
Reviews.Author: Lindsey H
Reviews.Content: The service at the Emerald Shores hotel was fantastic! Robert was very attentive at the front desk and had great suggestions for things to do in the local area. Accommodations were great! We appreciated the kitchenette in our room! The view was amazing! Thank you for a great stay! We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “would only stay here in the summer”
Reviews.Author: leatherhat14
Reviews.Content: Would only stay here if I was using it for a beach trip. Meaning it would be alright if you only had time in the room to sleep. The carpet was nasty and old. The refrigerator sat in the floor, not healthy. They still use the typical large comforter, wish these hotels would watch hotel impossible one time. A plus would be this is a oceanfront hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Okay Value, You Get What You Pay For”
Reviews.Author: Kim B
Reviews.Content: Talk about no frills; you get a hard, uncomfortable bed with a view. Pool was clean; hot tub was hot. No extra's. Would have been okay if the beds were just a tad softer. No coffee maker, no shampoo, conditioner, just bar soap. The staff was pleasant. Elevators were pretty quick. Room was clean. Beautiful view. Would stay there again but I would bring a mattress pad and some additional creature comforts.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel...”
Reviews.Author: Kathy C
Reviews.Content: We were just in Daytona beach june 16-22 and stay here at Emerald Shores Hotel and had a great time.. The rooms were big the bed was good slept good. Staff was very friendly and helpful pool and hot tub very well taking care of.. love that it was right on the beach.. We relaxed every night in the hot tub when we got back from being on the beach all day.. We will stay here when we come back.. Thanks to the staff for a great stay for me and my husband.... :))

Reviews.Title: “Good value, very clean!”
Reviews.Author: oksana18
Reviews.Content: Stayed a few times at this hotel, got a good rate. The rooms are very clean, the maid service was pretty good most of the days. The kitchenette is kind of small. The free breakfast was kind of disappointing, only coffee, pop tarts and some other sweets, not even worth coming downstairs for. Other than that it's nice and would definitely stay there again. The pool is a bit small for a hotel this size, get's crowded, the pool deck also get's very crowded, enjoyed the hot tub (especially with the cool and rainy weather we had). The location of course is awesome, right on the beach!

Reviews.Title: “Great Get Away”
Reviews.Author: Helen B
Reviews.Content: Hotel was a great get away for a lovely evening. Hotel was quiet and clean ! Pool and Spa were well kept . Staff were helpful in mentioning places to go . We are making plans on returning as soon as we can get away from work ! Tonight ?

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel staff EVER!”
Reviews.Author: vulture28
Reviews.Content: I have been vacationing in the Daytona Beach area for over 30 years. My family stayed 7 nights at the Emerald Shores hotel. What a pleasant surprise to be greeted by one of the best hotel managers in the Daytona area. Welcome back Ahmad. Ahmad has assembled a great hotel staff. Robert was constantly looking up addresses for me and then printing a map to my destination. My daughter had a birthday while we were there. No problem Kanesha another staff member quickly recommended a Mexican restaurant for us. I stayed in an oceanfront room on the eighth floor. These rooms are bigger than most in other Daytona hotels. The balcony is spacious and has an excellent view of the Atlantic Ocean. This hotel is located in quite section of town perfect for families. The continental breakfast was coffee orange juice and snacks. The pool was clean and the hot tub was blazing hot. I will be back here next year.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Karen A
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here in June 2012 and had a great experience. The staff (Stacey) was friendly, the property clean and quiet and the ocean view is fantastic. You get the basics for a good price.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic view from the balcony of the ocean and Daytona beach”
Reviews.Author: jaynell
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 3 nights in May 2012. The hotel is right next to the beach and most rooms look out across the ocean / beach, the main road runs past the front of the hotel however there is no noise from the road as the hotel is set back from the road by the car park...which is free! Rooms are spacious and typical beach holiday rooms, not luxurious but adequate. They could do with some redecoration. They have a carpets and a TV. Our room was an efficiency so it had a fridge which was handy, a small stove, sink, toaster, cutlery and china. However, there was no-where to actually prepare any food which I found a bit odd. There was daily housekeeping but it was very quick..only the bin was emptied and the bathroom tidied but there was fresh towels every day. The beds were very comfortable and the bathroom was large and clean whith an enourmous sink area for toiletries etc. The staff were very friendly, the pool was lovely and clean and there was an out door jacuzzi too. The lounger beds were a bit uncomfortable though and not very sturdy. My boyfriend actually fell through one when he sat on it! He didn't find it amusing...but I did! On a morning there is coffee, orange juice and pre-packed danish pastries for breakfast in the lobby which was okay (however, we went to IHOP on two occassions which was a 15 minute walk down the road or a 2 minute car journey). There was a great ice cream parlour across the road which was fabulous but it didn't open until 2pm. The shopping / restaurant area on the beach is about a 10 minute drive down the road but there wasn't a lot to do there. A couple of restaurants such as Bubba Gump, a few shops and bars. I had a nice time at this hotel but Daytona beach seems a little quiet, there wasn't much going on.

Reviews.Title: “Our Daytona Beach Shores Home for 8 nights”
Reviews.Author: Knights3254
Reviews.Content: My Family stayed here for 8 nights and I found the staff friendly and helpful especially Robert. He geniunely seemed like he wanted us to have a good stay and his recommendations for places to eat were always right on the money. Morning staff was wonderful as well. Rooms do need some sprucing up but they were clean and large. I did notice the bathroom paint and trim needed some attention and the furniture looks dated but was clean. Carpeting in the rooms needed to be replaced. Beds were hard but I slept well most nights. Breakfast I would not try as it was Great Value Walmart snacks and OJ and Coffee. I will leave seperate dining tips for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Balcony was nice overlooking pool and hot tub. Ice Machine on 6th floor never worked entire during our 8 day stay and by just looking at it, seemed to have been broken for a while. Hotel provides no shampoo or conditioner but they do provide facial and bath soap. Towels and wash clothes were thin. No Coffeemaker in room. Pool towels were available and rough. Pool Chairs were hard and uncomfortable needed padding. Pool was cold and Hot Tub was nice but seemed to get colder as week went on. Housekeeping was fine and efficient and elevators were good as well. Parking was fine and although most days free wifi was easy to access some days you could not get on until later in day. When we arrived we were scheduled to be on the 1st floor and I was very thankful to Robert who was able to move us up to the 6th floor for our stay. Electronic Key Cards worked spotty at best we had to make several trips to lobby to get them to reset them. It got to be a running joke among staff and us. This is not the Hilton but if you want a clean large room and friendly staff then this is the place to stay. Overall for the price I paid for the 8 days I was satisifed with our stay and will return again in the future if we come back to Daytona Beach Shores Area again.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding customer service”
Reviews.Author: Frank T
Reviews.Content: Our most recent visit lasted 12 days and the customer service provided by Kanesha, Erica and Stacey was simply outstanding. They handled every issue with friendliness and professionalism and we are looking forward to returning again in a few months. There was also a young man at the front desk who's name we unfortunately didn't get, but he also was a excellent host.

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST SERVICE AND VIEW ON THE BEACH”
Reviews.Author: INGRID C
Reviews.Content: I highly recommendall of you to stay at the hotel on Daytona Beach Shores. Erica, Stacey and Tanisha from the front desk will make you feel just like a PRINCESS because they care. The hotel has a great location, waterfront and some rooms has kitchen and microwave, I highly recommend to rent a room with kitchenette because is not many walking restaurants in the area, Only one i found, But is a lot of delivery restaurants and fast foods very close to the hotel. the rooms are very clean, and quiet at night, the ocean view is spectacular and the hotel staff are the best ever. I live in Orlando, FL and I will return again as soon as I have time free fron the university, perfect place to rest and relax, Ingrid C.

Reviews.Title: “Very Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: lkevans7
Reviews.Content: After 7 years of staying at Emerald Shores, they finally disappointed me in a very personal way. I had reservations for Memorial Day Weekend as I have the last 7 years. I ended up in the hospital on Thursday, May 24th with a serious matter. I called to cancel my weekend and was informed I would be charged 1 nights stay for not giving them 72 hours notice. I understand rules, BUT I have been staying there 3 and 4 times a year for over 7 years. I have brought numerous family and friends to stay as well. I have sent over 40 people to stay at this hotel......whatever happened to loyalty?

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing Beach Trip”
Reviews.Author: bobman173
Reviews.Content: I had purchased five nights through Eversave online deals and booked these nights for May 6 through May 11. Other than looking at TripAdvisor reviews, I had no former knowledge of this hotel and did not know what to expect. I was happily surprised. It is a very nice hotel located in a very good area in Daytona Beach Shores. I had a large ocean front room with a king bed, refrigerator and microwave. The view from the room was beautiful. Everything worked and both the room and the hotel in general were very clean. The hotel had a well maintained pool area which had direct access to the beach. I did not partake of their breakfast since it was only served until nine o'clock which is about the time I would wake up every day. The physical location of the hotel is excellent because it was only a couple miles from the bridge going to Port Orange where there are plenty of restaurants and it is only a short distance to Ponce Inlet. Everyone who worked at the hotel who I came in contact with were very friendly and very helpful. I especially want to thank Robert for all his help and advice and also Stacey.

Reviews.Title: “Staff Workers and Penthouse Suite was Great!”
Reviews.Author: BDr3ad
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed my stay.Stacey and Kanesha were great in handling all of our needs!Thanks Ladies!Will be back....SOON!

Reviews.Title: “Daytona Beach Feb 2012 visit”
Reviews.Author: millsman817
Reviews.Content: Great staff, clean room and a great ocean front location, and very affordable rates.

Reviews.Title: “Million Dollar View....older hotel needs work”
Reviews.Author: PalmTreeNetwork
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 1 night in April. Check in was fantastic and staff here are very friendly. Went up to room and carpets in elevator and hallways are old and worn.....same in the room. Room was spacious with a fridge that was rusted on the outside. A/c unit was noisy like freight train that cycled all night....did not sleep. People smoke on balconies and you can smell it in your room. Wife has asthma and could not breath all night and we checked out next day.

Reviews.Title: “My hotel of choice in the Daytona area”
Reviews.Author: Shadowe10
Reviews.Content: This was my first stay here, but it will not be my last. Stacy at the front desk was sweet and funny and very professional. The room was just as promised - oceanfront with an amazing view of the ocean, wall-to-wall windows/sliding glass door to a nice balcony with chairs. The room was spotless and spacious. My only minor issue is that the AC did not cool the room down enough for me - but then I sleep with the windows open when it's snowing outside, so maybe it's me. :) The hotel was quiet and peaceful, just what I was looking for. I will absolutely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great location; disappointed in staff and noise”
Reviews.Author: Nightrain
Reviews.Content: The location is great; right on the beach; but so are most other Daytona hotels. The room is average; about what you would expect from a Daytona hotel. Now, I normally reward positive experiences in all of my reviews, but unfortunately this hotel didn't deliver. I decided to try this place based on the information I read here. It was a Sunday night and slow. The front desk clerk was friendly, but as soon as I mentioned I booked the room through a third-party service, she automatically said "oh well you know that this room doesn't have a view right? They probably told you it did because they lie to their customers all the time." This is the second time a hotel has bad-mouthed a travel service. I'm not sure what the war is between hotels and third-party booking agencies, but when I was at the airlines I didn't bad-mouth other carriers. I explained I knew it didn't have a view and they were honest when I booked it. Despite the fact that there were maybe 5 cars in the entire parking lot, she put us in a room right between two elevators. I gave it a chance since there weren't many people around. Bad idea. At 5 a.m. we were rudely awakened by the hallway trash can in front of our room getting loudly knocked over and crashed into our door, with people yelling and talking in the halls. It sounded as if the staff was emptying the trash and not caring who heard. I don't want to blame them and don't know why they would empty the trash so early, so maybe it wasn't them. Maybe it was other guests acting badly. We were awake for a while after that. We finally fell back asleep and woke up around 8 a.m. to some sort of loud repetitive sounds. I chalked it up to elevator noise and eventually decided to get up. The phone rang at 11:00 a.m. and the voice on the other end curtly said "We were wondering if you were ever checking out today." Pardon me? When is check-out? 11 a.m...OK 11 a.m. is now and you are already trying to rush us out, even though the hotel is practically deserted. I said I would be down in a few minutes and hung up. I should have inquired when check-out was, and normally I am told by the front desk when I check in. 11 a.m. is a bit early, but fine. I probably slept too long because I didn't get a good night's sleep, but I've never had a hotel call right at check-out time. Most hotels are a bit more courteous or forgiving. I opened my door and the cleaning crew was standing right outside waiting. One said "oh speak of the devil..." They came in the room before I even had a chance to walk out. I am definitely not one of those guests who abuses my check-out time, and I have stayed in many hotels, but I have never been made to feel so unwelcome or rushed to leave. I really don't appreciate that, seeing how I chose your hotel and paid to stay there. I am always courteous and respectful to people and expect the same in return. I went downstairs and the two front desk agents were chatting away and ignored me for a while. Finally they said "oh checking out...OK." I held my tongue and just handed them the key. My traveling companion asked for a receipt. One said "Oh we can't do that because you booked it through your third-party." (Fine, but I'm sure you have some sort of our information in the computer.) No thank yous, goodbyes, how was your stay, just back to the conversation as we walked out. I was angry when I left but I didn't say anything, and it takes quite a bit to get me angry. I can promise I will not return to this hotel that couldn't wait for me to leave. I'm only giving them average because of the good location and the distant possibility the staff were all having a bad day at the same time. I will return to the hotel on here I previously reviewed, and it seems most everyone on here agrees with me based on their reviews.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: Christina6005
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed at Emerald Shores Hotel a few weeks ago. We got a great rate on a room with a kitchen area. The room was very neat and clean. The view was gorgeous overlooking the beach and pool. We were greeted by Stacy who was very friendly. I was really surprised at how fast she had everything ready for us to check in! It was very fast! Everyone was so helpful and nice! We were having a problem getting our ac to turn off and I told the man at the desk. In 10 minutes someone came to our room and check on it and fixed the problem! Also, it was the evening hours so I never expected such fast service. We thoroughly enjoyed the trip and would stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “We spent a greate week over tge spring brake!”
Reviews.Author: AtlantaElena
Reviews.Content: Staff was excellent.Helpful and nice!Room was big and clean.Great view from the balcony!Kids loved the ocean!Water was great!Lots of hings to see!All great places just an hour drive!We will return next year.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Large Room, Wonderful View”
Reviews.Author: Jadedmind
Reviews.Content: We booked one night here on our way home from Orlando, mainly so the kids could see the ocean. They were pretty accommodating. We ended up arriving much later than we thought we would on a busy night for them, but they had held our room, and were even friendly about it. I couldn't believe the size of the room when we walked in. There was a full kitchen, a large bathroom, and very spacious bedroom with 2 queen beds (I think a third bed could probably have fit in there with no problem), plus a private balcony with a fantastic view of the beach. I wasn't expecting a room that size for the price we paid. Of course, the furnishings and design were very basic, nothing special, and I actually found the bed a little uncomfortable, but we were just staying one night, so it was fine. The view more than made up for it. We got up early, watched the sun rise over the ocean, and the kids were able to run around on the beach and in the water for awhile before it got too crowded. Very relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “Family fun”
Reviews.Author: funparadise
Reviews.Content: Our Family had a wonderful time at Emerald Shoes Hotel. The rooms and bathrooms were big and well planned. The Staff was very freindly and helpful. They felt like family. The place was very Clean at all times. The Location was perfect and easy to find. We felt like we got a real bang for our buck, and would return again. I own a resort and took lots of Brouchers for my own customers to use. Judy

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place!!!”
Reviews.Author: Alin923
Reviews.Content: I have been staying here every year for several years now and it's always a great place to stay! You can't beat the quality, location, price, AND HOTTUB!!! The staff is always really friendly as well, especially the housekeeping staff! Stacey was the attendant who checked us in this year. Super-friendly, informed and helpful! I can't say enough about my little find. Hope you check it out and you'll find out what I already know!

Reviews.Title: “Great for location...if you get a deal!”
Reviews.Author: vicky j
Reviews.Content: Great location, we had a king ocean view and the view was fab. The rooms however are supposedly ... New.. NOT..very basic motel style..not even very clean...poor quality bedding. We got the room at an amazing low price of $65 a night..if you pay any more than this you will be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, but don't stay here if you need Internet.”
Reviews.Author: Ktsdg8
Reviews.Content: I stayed in a room with a king size bed. The room was huge, everything was clean, there was both a fridge and a microwave in the room. There was no iron or ironing board in the room, but the front desk was able to get me one upon request. My only problem with this hotel was the incredible difficulty in getting on to the Internet. Since I travel for business, I definitely need Internet access, and although the signal was strong, the system must have been severely overloaded since it was basically impossible to get online. Other than that, my stay was very pleasant and I would recommend this hotel for vacationers, but not business professionals.

Reviews.Title: “Good Stay on a Budget”
Reviews.Author: timberowl
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a place right on the beach with a private pool and hot tub, and you don't require any bells and whistles, this is the place for you. I had a CrowdSavings (similar to Groupon) voucher for a 2-night stay for two here. It looks really tacky in comparison to the surrounding hotels, from the beach view. You can tell it's older, but has been renovated and newly painted. The room was nice. Two adequately comfortable queen beds, a large balony with non-matching chairs. Thermostat worked well and a/c was quiet. The ocean view was beautiful, and the waves sounded nice through the door. Older television with basic cable. As someone said earlier, the breakfast is more like "breakfast snacks." They had an old fashioned coffee maker, pop tarts, and little debbie type breakfast foods laid out, first come first serve. That was about it. The rooms come with a full sized fridge, 2-burner stove and microwave though. There's a Publix about a mile down the road, but they're severely overpriced. There was no shampoo or conditioner in the bathroom, but there was bar soap. The beach was really nice, and not crowded. It wasn't within walking distance of "Daytona Beach", but you could see it down the road. About a 10-minute drive, though a pain to park. I won't be going back, but have no real complaints.

Reviews.Title: “Beyond Expectations!”
Reviews.Author: Corey M
Reviews.Content: Every once in a while you find a business where their people really get it, how to serve so well that their customers become their best advertisers. The Emerald Shores Hotel staff were wonderful and seemed to actually enjoy working there. We booked there kind of last minute through a site after doing a Google search for beachfront hotels in Daytona Beach. We wanted two nights on a Thursday and Friday and we wanted oceanfront. There was an oceanfront room available for Thursday but not Friday. We booked that room and had to book a riverview room for Friday which meant we would have to move half way through our stay, but we thought that was better than not having an oceanview room for both nights. When we checked in the manager was the one who was dealing with us. When he realized we were booked into seperate room types for the two nights he went into his reservations on his computer and figured out how he could give us an oceanfront room for both nights so we wouldn't have to move and we could enjoy the incredible view for our whole stay.This was really going above and beyond because we didn't even ask him to do this, he just did it. Thank you Bradley! The beach in front of the hotel wasn't ever crowded and the pool and hottub area were kept really clean, I even saw the groundskeeper checking chlorine levels on both days to make sure the water was safe to swim in. The coffee was good, we skipped the pastries and had bought a few groceries so we could have breakfast in our room. Overall the value we got for our money was incredible, so what if the continental breakfast is some bought pastries from the local grocery store. If you don't like those, don't eat them. We will go back to Emerald Shores and bring our kids next time.

Reviews.Title: “Yuck!!”
Reviews.Author: dolphinfan200013
Reviews.Content: I checked in to this hotel late after a long day, the room and bathroom were pretty clean. It was when I turned down the bed I got a shock, I found numerous hairs in the bed and the sheets appeared unchanged. I informed the front desk clerk and he changed them for me. Upon check out when asked how everything was I told the lady at the desk about it and she acted as if I were lying. She got a little hateful with me and told me it wasn't uncommon to find a couple hairs that fall from the maid. I then informed her it was way more than a couple. The sign out front says newest cleanest rooms on beach, after seeing this I am not sure I agree.

Reviews.Title: “Great two days”
Reviews.Author: Leo478
Reviews.Content: I had gone to Hotels.com and looked through all the hotels, liked the review and was able to get Ocean View, with two queen beds...the room was neat and very clean...the AC/Heat worked and was very quiet...the sliding doors to the balcony worked well and the drapes kept the room dark when we wanted it dark...the pool was nice and the jaccuzi was hot enough..the steps to the beach, which was very near, were sound...The complimentary breakfast and other snacks, including the drink machine, all worked well. I dealt with different staff members and all were competent and helpful, especially Stacey. I recommend Emerald Shores and will stay there again....Leo

Reviews.Title: “Million dollar view, ordinary accomodations”
Reviews.Author: askmey
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night at Emerald Shores while visiting Daytona Beach and had an oceanview room. The view was fantastic. The room was very ordinary, with well-worn carpet,molding loose, the in-room refrigerator door was spotted with rust, and door's closed loudly--very noticeable when guests down the hall came it at 2:30a.m. The continental breakfast consisted of cheap pastries from Wal Mart--not important to us since we brought our own breakfast fruit, but if I had expected a real continental breakfast, I think I would have been disappointed. The facility was clean, which must be a challenge with all the beach sand. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The location was good for the attractions we were there to see. An attractive small pool area although in our short stay we did not have time to try out pool or hot tub. The price was significantly less than neighboring hotels, so if you want to enjoy the beach and other attractions and just need a place to sleep, or watch the surf from the balcony, we would certainly recommend this hotel. If you desire a little more comfort and amenities, you will want to stay elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: CharlieHerb
Reviews.Content: It took us a while to actually find this place, but when we did we were pleasently surprised. It was great value, great location, chean and had free parking. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Slice of heaven”
Reviews.Author: By C
Reviews.Content: My wife and I would love to leave a "10(at least) review" but am not seeing anything on your page which allows us to do that. We enjoyed our stay at your Hotel, tho it seemed more like a piece of heaven... Your Hotel could not have been any cleaner, contrary to comments we had read before we came down. Being right ON the beach, closeness to I-4, the racetrack,downtown DB, and the Boardwalk on the beach...could go on, but it might seem like an ad Great location...but the aforementioned is why in part... Your staff in their entirety were just downright pleasant! Again, contrary to prior comments we had read. The riverview from our 6th floor room was excellent, tho maybe we will try for a beachside view the next time we come back! If there was a shortcoming, and for us it was not, was the "cont" breakfast...add some Krispy Kremers that shouldn't cost that much . But like I said for us, we grabbed a coffee and went to one of several nearby inexpensive restaurants (Cracked Egg, IHop). We honestly enjoyed our stay with y'all and look forward in returning, hopefully an oceanview... Have a fantastic day...God bless! Byron & Robin Copp Concord N.H.

Reviews.Title: “best value in florida”
Reviews.Author: Hartwell B
Reviews.Content: my wife and i stayed here over new years. service and staff were fantastic. when we arrived home, my wife received a call that a ring had been found in the room. she was asked to describe it, and it was one of ours! we sent the hotel a prepaid fedex package, and they mailed the ring to us. joy! aside from a superb manager and staff, the pool and jacuzzi are right on the beach overlooking the ocean, like something out of a hollywood movie. the rooms are comfortable. the elevators are quick and smooth. walking distance to a great miniature golf place. location is spectacular, and the beach is out the lobby, past the pool patio, and you're right on it. since we sleep on a tempurpedic, the bed was not quite as comfortable as we're used to, but we slept fine. the most any other hotel in florida could do in terms of value is to match this place. the combination of price, location and service are out of this world :)

Reviews.Title: “Not going again”
Reviews.Author: arisha-hamzah
Reviews.Content: Seems on Daytona beach, hotels occupancy rates are quite higher, therefore as a business rule, they are in general, charging much more than if comparing similar hotels in not so popular spots.This hotel is not an exception. What we liked; 1- Location, extremely good 2- Ocean view room, enhanced our experience with the sunrise 3- We came earlier than check-in time but the front desk helped me getting the room right away. What we did not like 1- Beds, not comfortable 2- Smells in the room 3- Breakfast, it was a joke (a bad one) 4- Wi-Fi not working (excuse given by front desk, too many people) 5- locks on the door to go to the balcony were not working properly/damaged Overall, the room and the bathroom seemed very ordinary. Tip for visitors; Pay few dollars extra if you can get a better room in the neighborhood but if you have to choose this hotel to do some economy it is worth paying extra for ocean view. Assume they don't have breakfast to avoid any dissatisfaction. Tip for Hotel management; You need to renovate the rooms and you need to say you don't provide breakfast, Charge a little more, I know you are doing good business even now but you will do even better if you invest a little more and having higher rate of satisfied customer perhaps will give you more satisfaction too.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing value for the price...We'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: CovAmy
Reviews.Content: For those who are economy-minded like us, this place is a great find. Upon arrival, we were greeted by the manager who already had everything ready to go...even though we were early. The room was very clean and somewhat larger than the average hotel room. The only down side was no microwave...oh and the breakfast selection wasn't that great, but its free. The pool was spotless and heated so we were able to enjoy a new years eve swim.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay here whenever in Daytona Beach, an exceptional value.”
Reviews.Author: taash14
Reviews.Content: I was an extended stay and this felt like home, except for the beach in the backyard thing. The staff was extremely friendly and provided great service. The mini kitchen allows you to keep your expenses down which is a great help. The room was spacious and well maintained. I was obviously extremely happy with my choice and although I was alone, it's obvious that this would be great for a family as well.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic value; great view”
Reviews.Author: Duane27
Reviews.Content: Hotel is on the beachfront, and has an awesome view. An older hotel, but the room was nice and clean. Heated pool and hot tub on patio that is beachside. They advertise breakfast, but it is just some offbrand pop-tarts and granola bars. Appeared to be several eating places nearby, although we didn't eat at any.

Reviews.Title: “Middle of the road beach hotel....”
Reviews.Author: carrma75
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Emerald Shores on 11/11/11 after the manager Bradley Reising was kind enough to provide us with a free stay in the “Presidential Suite” after a disastrous stay in 04/2011. This suite was better, but the hotel remains outdated and the furniture, knick knacks, and fake plants are right out of the 1980’s. It appears that overall the cleaning and maintenance staff lack attention to detail as again there was missing paint in some areas, broken knick knacks, and dusty fake plants. I would recommend to management to impress upon his staff that it is important when they see things that are broken, or in need of service to inform you to get them resolved. I initially thought that this was a huge problem because I travel so frequently to many areas, but after spending the day in Daytona and seeing other available options in the Daytona Shores area, I can say without a doubt that this hotel is probably your best bet if you do not want to break the bank. It’s a middle of the road beach hotel – it provides air conditioning, the beach, and a small kitchen which is good if you are traveling with a family. Overall the place is cleaner than I remembered and the staff is friendly enough. After now staying in the suite I would definitely recommend the place for the value of your money, but suggest paying the extra for a beach side room. I would also suggest either getting rid of the offered “continental breakfast” or upgrading the items – as it simply seems like a bunch of Walmartish/generic pecan rolls and granola bars. Again, if you are staying in Daytona Shores…and don’t want to break the bank…this is the place to go. Thanks again to Bradley for offering us a second chance to stay at the hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value,fantastic views,”
Reviews.Author: Murat N
Reviews.Content: There has been a huge improvement at this hotel in the past few years. We have been coming here for over four. It provides excellent value for money specially of peak. Do yourself a favour get a sea view room( pay the extra ) well worth it. Top floors are better for scenery and quiter. Rooms are spacious and clean ,all have balconys. Wifi reception is also better on this side of the building,they also have internet access at the reception area. Room service attentive to detail. Two fast elevators. You should concider breakfast non existent that way you won't be disappointed. Coffee was good. Plenty of parking space. Pool side was cleaned frequently but they ran out of towels all too often and would have to agree with others on it's quality . Staff and management very friendly and professional . Best thing about this hotel is it's location . Right on the beautiful Daytona beach. For breakfast try Cracked Egg just down the street. Plenty of places to eat my wife and I frequented Bonefish,Carabas,to name a few. De Land is half hour drive away where there are lots of small shops. Daytona is a whole lot better of peak.

Reviews.Title: “if something get lost or stolen”
Reviews.Author: Mike E
Reviews.Content: the hotel are ok butb if something hapen with your own property and request manager and police to review your case the management advise you up front of police you are not longer allowed to stay on this property and never come back the police serve you as a criminal for almost one hour taking picture of you and reletives and writing a tresspassing warning i was loosing 270.00 dollar was bin taken from my room by roomservice on my 27.universerie wekend it is a schame on hotel staff and local police department

Reviews.Title: “Good location n view”
Reviews.Author: Viacheslaf
Reviews.Content: Rooms are big but not cozy and our towels looked veeery old - that was unpleasant. Service was fine - helped me all the times with my needs. Overall it's a good hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Would not stay again!”
Reviews.Author: ametaldiva77
Reviews.Content: Let me preface this review by saying that we checked Tripadvisor before booking this hotel (via Hotwire - we figured out which one it was) so we were hopeful that our stay over Labor Day weekend would turn out okay. Obviously, from my review title, you can see that it did not. I am wondering if some of the previous reviews were written by real guests?... Anyway, when we checked in the lady at the front desk told us that we got the very last room in the place. After seeing our room I totally believe that because our room was like a dungeon and should not even be available for booking on any website. We had one long, but small window that looked out onto a concrete wall or rooftop; there was barely even any daylight in the room when the curtains were open. The hotel was dirty; we should have known something was up when we got to our room and the “public” trashcan was right outside of our door with trash in bags sitting in the floor next to it. Our room in particular did not appear to have been cleaned properly (that or the hotel is so old that everything just looks dirty) and did not have adequate bedding. When we asked about a blanket for our bed at the front desk we were told that they don’t put blankets on the beds but they are available by request (I have never heard of a hotel in my life that doesn’t put any type of blanket on the beds) but we still did not receive a blanket because they were all out (maybe other people expected blankets on their beds too?). The furnishings in the room looked like they were from 1980 and the room was so dark and dingy that my husband and I almost considered leaving the hotel and going back home. The bed was just about unbearable and we woke up very sore the next morning after what little sleep we could get due to the all of the noise from other guests on our floor. The high-speed internet access did not work for almost the entirety of our stay (which was less than 18 hours due to our quick exit on checkout morning). All of the pool towels were gone every time we attempted to get one to use. The continental breakfast was nonexistent. I could go on and on, but suffice to say, this was not the type of stay we were expecting for a quick, impromptu anniversary weekend getaway. Also, I saw the management response to a previous negative review and I think they are just trying to act like they care so that people who come to Tripadvisor to read reviews will think one or two negative reviews are not the norm at this hotel - I don't buy it for a minute and furthermore, there was no "letter of welcome" from the GM in our room and the comment regarding this hotel being the "newest" in the area is ridiculous, maybe new management, a new name, or something similar, but definitely not a "new" hotel.

Reviews.Title: “I had another wonderful vacation !”
Reviews.Author: mojabo
Reviews.Content: Emerald Shores is our favorite beach front hotel in Daytona Beach. We have been coming to Daytona for more than 15 years. After our first stay at E.S. we were hooked. Super nice and helpful employees. Bradley will bend over backwards to accommodate everyone. The folks at the front desk are very helpful with any question or situation. Kailee can even work on your computer. Donna our housekeeper is first rate. You can always expect to have a clean, comfortable room. We have always stayed in an ocean front efficiency, we have a wonderful view of the ocean. We see the sunrise over the ocean every morning. With calm waters in the morning you can sometimes catch the dollphins swiming by. Parking is free, laundry is available, pool towels are furnished, pool and spa are always clean. I have only one negative and that is, I finally have to go home.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value For The Price”
Reviews.Author: Over50inKC
Reviews.Content: Just flew home yesterday. Stayed 4 days so had ample time to check everything out. Would stay at Emerald Shores Hotel again in a second. Walked up and down the beach (and drove in front too) of all the hotels and ranked them. Hands down, for the money, Emerald came out on top. Super clean inside and out. Nice clean pool/hot tub. Plenty of deck space/chairs around the pool. Half of the rooms are ocean front with private balconies. Beach area not busy. Parking lot well lit. Has two fast elevators. Small game room with snack/pop/ice machine also in game room. In room microwave/full size refrigerator/2 burner electric range. Large bathroom with granite top. Front staff always available to help/answer questions. A NO SMOKING hotel so you can breathe. No pets so you don't have to worry about stepping/sleeping in "Fluffy's accident" from the day before. Not the hotel of choice for party animals either. Breakfast is minimal (O.J./coffee/pop tarts/packaged rolls). Have stayed in 4 other name brand hotels in Daytona (all larger complexes) and liked this one the best.

Reviews.Title: “outstanding experience”
Reviews.Author: kathy d
Reviews.Content: We originally chose this motel based on a recommendation from a family member who had stayed there and was very pleased with the cleanliness, service and price. We have now stayed there twice and plan on staying there during future trips to the area. The hotel staff was very courteous and helpful. The manager, Bradley, was exceptionally personable and made us feel very welcome. The rooms were very neat, clean and comfortable. We would highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay! Will be back!”
Reviews.Author: radio_bill
Reviews.Content: Had booked 3 days for after our business trip in Orlando based on reviews here, called back a few weeks later to add another day to our stay, and they matched the price for the other 3 days, even though it was a Saturday. Great customer service and satisfaction. Let me start off by saying this is not the Hilton, The Shores, The Westin, or...you know what I'm saying... What it is, is a beachfront economical clean hotel. Everything we needed was within driving distance, and it was a great central location for day trips to Canaveral National Seashore and St. Augustine. One of the workers at the hotel even gave us a boogie board someone had left behind to use for our stay for free, and we left it behind for someone else. :) We hit the hot tub every night to wind down after our day, and used the pool every day too. We had an efficiency with a fridge, micro, and burners that were convenient too. It was a full size fridge which was nice. Our room and each beachfront room has a private balcony too, which was just great for relaxing and staring at the ocean, which never gets old. parking was great, everything was great. Nothing negative at alll to say about Emerald Shores, we're taking about bringing our girls back next year with us for a stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and comfortable. We had a great time.”
Reviews.Author: TNNinaC
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay. Most of our time was spent enjoying the ocean and the view from our room was amazing. Make sure you ask for an oceanview room - the first night we spent was overlooking the parking lot so we changed rooms - well worth the few extra dollars! The continental breakfast isn't worth your time but there are restaurants everywhere down the street. We had cocktails at Peck Plaza, which is next door, on the 29th floor. Make sure you see that view!!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel for a great price!”
Reviews.Author: seasonb0202
Reviews.Content: This hotel was nice and we got it at a great price. The staff was friendly, room was clean, View was AMAZING! Wasn't the fanciest hotel but we were looking for family friendly, clean at a low rate and we found it. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “the most relaxing stay i have ever had !”
Reviews.Author: sheila e
Reviews.Content: the hotel was very clean , the house keeping was fantastic , every staff member i met was eager to help anyway they could with a smile , stayed in a oceanfront efficency on the fourth floor with a full kitchen was like being at home with fantastic views from the private balcony where i spent a lot of my time . will definately return and will reccomend this hotel to friends and family .

Reviews.Title: “Comfrotable with great views!”
Reviews.Author: angelbear425
Reviews.Content: When we arrived at the hotel we found out that our room was upgraded to an efficiency on the 9th floor (which was perfect because I asked for a high floor!). The room was spacious, spotless clean, and the view was incredible! The balconies are private so you don't have to worry about others bugging you. The continental breakfast definitely shouldn't be mentioned because it's only granola bars from Walmart, but there is a great place for breakfast on the pier. The internet seemed hit or miss, unless you were in the lobby, but I didn't really care because I wasn't on vacation to use the internet. If the hotel is busy their parking lot may fill up, but the front desk will give you a parking permit to park across the street. My only problem with the hotel was the housekeeping girl during our second weekend at the hotel. On Friday she came knocking at 9:15 (while we were still in bed) and I asked for an extra hour. She said no problem so we got up, got ready for the beach, and were out within an hour. Saturday, again the knock came at 9:15 while we were in bed. I answered the door, asked for an hour, and the girl gave me an attitude while questioning me. So I asked for a half hour instead, which she said fine. 20 minutes later we got one knock, while she barged right in (luckily we were both dressed, but we still weren't ready). I asked for 10 more minutes and the girl rolls her eyes at me and walks out. When we came back, we saw that only the bed was made, but we still had a pile of towels from the previous day and no fresh towels. Sunday we put up the do not disturb sign on the door, but were still out of the room before 10am (which was when we took the do not disturb off the door). We returned at 11:30 am to put something back in the room and saw the housekeeping cart next door. After a day at the beach we came back and the room wasn't touched at all. I have no problem making the bed myself, but I do find it a bit much to have to walk down to the first floor to get towels when someone is getting paid to put them in my room. Monday (different housekeeper) went back to the great service from the pervious time we were there. That is the only reason that I didn't give the hotel 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous week at the beach”
Reviews.Author: marleneh1
Reviews.Content: Emerald Shores is a clean and very affordable hotel right on the beach. Make sure you book an oceanfront room. They come with a balcony and face the ocean and the pool. The other rooms are not as nice and you face AIA and a parking lot. We made that mistake lastr year but still had a good time. The continental breakfast is just coffee and juice and some packaged pastries. Still, for under $100 per night I thought it was very good for the money.

Reviews.Title: “RUN! DON'T WALK!!!!”
Reviews.Author: longdistance33
Reviews.Content: Ok I first want to say I am not picky at all! I just want the basics (clean, good location, friendly staff). The ONLY thing going for this hotel is good location. I always take pictures of the rooms I stay in an post them on here... I didnt even bother this time, was just ALL bad! The bathroom floor looked so dirty, I actually think it was just a bad grout job but it just makes it look so dirty. Their was hair in the bed (NOT ours)... Floor had a nasty sticky feeling to it ( an yes it's carpet - can carpet feel sticky? Yes it can obviously!!) The staff would sit at the front desk an never look up to greet you... Only nice person was cheery lady at check in... The older man at check out was apparently to busy reading a newspaper to even care. I always read the reviews on here an try to decide should I stay at a certain place an wish people would just say yes or no.... Well I can say on this one NO! Do not stay here! I wouldn't stay here again if they told me I could have the room free for a week! I do NOT recommend this place.

Reviews.Title: “Great vacation”
Reviews.Author: Wendy0627
Reviews.Content: Great family vacation staff was great great location just out of daytona so it was a quiet vacation with much to do a couple miles up the road. Beach right there .no to the comments continental breakfast was not fancy but most places give u nothing and FYI just up the rd there is a ny bakery and a little further up is there deli best homemade bagels at either for breakfast at a low price Bradley the gm was very available if needed and upon arrival made sure we got our desired room. If come back to daytona would def. Stay there

Reviews.Title: “I'd stay again”
Reviews.Author: Shannon077
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and neat, just not extravagant. We enjoyed the location and pool area. The continental breakfast is a joke, packages of generic brand poptarts (with no toaster available) and granola bars.

Reviews.Title: “would recommend”
Reviews.Author: naane
Reviews.Content: Nothing bad to say about the hotel. We loved it and are planning on staying there again next year. The kids loved the pool and hot tub. Great access to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Another great visit!”
Reviews.Author: bnowak55
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy, but great price & great location--right on the ocean. Have been coming here for years. Some rooms have kitchenette which is very handy. Staff is great--especially Kaylie!!! Look forward to seeing her every year!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value Nothing Fancy”
Reviews.Author: nigeldkat
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here several times. When we got in the room it smelled of cleaning products. We always carry a candle so that took care of that. Our room was always well cleaned. It isn’t a new room or a new hotel but it was in good repair. This isn’t a luxury resort but a nice little place on the beach. It is a good value for the money. We found the room to be quite and didn’t hear our neighbors. We will be coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Vacation”
Reviews.Author: MadreSmith
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd stay at Emerald Shores, and as usual it was a great vacation! This hotel is clean and the staff is always friendly. We had booked an oceanfront efficiency, and were pleasantly surprised to be able to stay in one of the more spacious end rooms at no extra charge. Housekeeping was wonderful and prompt everyday. This hotel is perfect for a family vacation, and my family will always make Emerald Shores our destination in Daytona Beach!!

Reviews.Title: “GOODTIMES!”
Reviews.Author: SurfXplorer
Reviews.Content: In late June, the kids and I discussed seeing the last shuttle launch so the hotel search began. Since the all of the decent hotels in the Cocoa Beach area were full, I checked out the Daytona Beach area and decided on the Emerald Shores. We were not disappointed! We arrived around 1:30PM after a 7 hour drive from Atlanta and the room was not ready so we went to lunch and it was ready around 3 which is the check-in time anyhow. I thought we reserved a non-oceanview room since we were going to be down by the Kennedy Space Center most of the weekend but we were put in 807 which was an oceanfront kitchenette...very nice. View was GREAT...Beds were comfortable...pool was simple...the hot tub was relaxing and house-keeping is very attentive. The continental breakfast which has been mentioned more than once in the reviews was really poor (as expected) so we brought our own (bagels, cream cheese, milk, cereal and fruit ) which is what I recommend everyone do since I believe there is at least a fridge and microwave in all the rooms. Bottom-line...great place to stay at a great price ($70 a night - Hotels.com) on the beach!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Place for Our Weekend Get Away”
Reviews.Author: jobee13
Reviews.Content: Visited Florida to see the last shuttle launch and sneak in a few beach days. The Emerald Shores topped off a great weekend! The staff was friendly, the rooms were clean and provided us with what we needed for the visit...views and access to the beach! Great location to do whatever you want to personalize your weekend! LOVED being able to rent a chair and umbrella from down the beach, sign it to my room and have it set up for me in front of the hotel! The rooms were not fancy and could use some TLC in areas but overall great. We will visit again (maybe again in August)! Thank you for being such a nice part of our weekend visit to Florida!

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Vacation!”
Reviews.Author: mpoff1
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here from June 26, 2011 - July 3, 2011 and had a great time! We have stayed here in the past and we have never been disappointed. We stayed in an Oceanfront efficiency which has a great view of the ocean. There is a small kitchen with everything you need including dishes and cooking utensils. There are two double beds in the room. The hotel is right on the beach and has a nice pool deck outside with plenty of lounge chairs, tables, a pool, and a hot tub. The rooms are very clean and the staff was very friendly. The only negatives are that the internet in the room was pretty slow, but they have a computer in the lobby that was had pretty fast internet. The water pressure in the shower was a little low, but not too bad. I would recommend this hotel especially for the price! We will definitely stay there again the next time we are in Daytona Beach!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT place to relax and enjoy the beach!!!"”
Reviews.Author: lisakuhl
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay with the kids. Very nice pool and staff, especially Katrina our housekeeper on the fourth floor. I stayed here with four kids, she went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable. Kids and sand can be very messy, especially with the heat and humidity. Our room was fresh, clean and cool everyday. The rooms and bathrooms were very roomy. The furnishings up to date and VERY clean. Beds were extremely comfortable, including the roll away.

Reviews.Title: “Great accomodations, great customer service”
Reviews.Author: PamL20
Reviews.Content: Very clean, nice room and hotel. The staff went out of their way to make our stay was exceptional. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “We love love Emerald Shores.”
Reviews.Author: coffeelady11
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Emerald Shores several times, in the last couple of years. The fromt desk clerk has always been very nice to us and remembered us. She has dark short hair and as always I forgot her name, but she is super nice. It was really nice to meet Bradley Reising, We met him last year and it was good to see him again this year. It nice to see a friendly face of upper management. We live in Lakeland, Fl. and come over to see Daytona Cubs play Flying Tigers( were Cub fans). We celebrated my husbands birthday last year and this year, June 9th. Now the rooms are great and clean, oceanview the best. I just wondered if you have a suite at your hotel? In the pictures I see leather couch and the room looks larger. I guess I'll close for this time. We might be seeing you real soon. Thank-you, Ruth and Bob Vlcek

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Comfy”
Reviews.Author: mammakinsinfl
Reviews.Content: This is a decent hotel and one of the better 2 star hotels I've stayed in. Pros: Clean, family friendly, free breakfast, comfy pillows Cons: needs some updating, scratchy blankets, no in room coffee

Reviews.Title: “Emeald Shores Come Through Again”
Reviews.Author: rnoblevf
Reviews.Content: My wife and I recently spent our 32nd wedding anniversary on the Daytona Beach and our stay at the Emerald Shores Hotel was great. Bradley the manager runs a cleanand,friendly operation. Jen at the front desk and Dolce in housekeeping deserve five stars for their service. Here's a dining tip. Go to DJ's Deck under the Dunlawton Bridge and eat at the bar. The lines are long but no waiting if you sit at the bar.

Reviews.Title: “Not a new property but has everything you need! And right on beautiful beach.”
Reviews.Author: happymama02
Reviews.Content: Well even though it isn't a nice new hotel doesn't mean it didn't fulfill us!! For $100. per night ocean view, I was happy! Free parking, 24 hour hot tub and pool if your quiet they don't mind! Friendly staff, Microwave and Fridge, Balcony, Cable, wifi. You can rent an umbrella at the desk for $30. a day with 2 chairs and a little table. They even came and moved us because the tide came up. The rentals are your 9-5 that day! Grocery store and gas stations all across the road as well as lots of surf shops! Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Good for the money.”
Reviews.Author: DeeDeeMac
Reviews.Content: A group of 5 of us stayed there on a Saturday night. We booked 2 Double Riverfront rooms for $66 a night on Expedia. We got there about 45 minutes before check in and one of our rooms was available so they let us go ahead and check in. The room was decent. An average 2.5 - 3 Star room. 2 queen size beds, small table w/ 2 chairs, small refrigerator (nice surprise), and a TV hutch. The bathrooms were fairly modern and clean. There were a few stains on the carpet in the hallway but it didn't feel dirty. It had a fresh, clean smell. The pool was a decent size with padded lounge chairs surrounding it. There was a good bit of sand in the pool which is to be expected at a beachside pool. However, I have been to other beachside pools that didn't have quite as much sand in it as this one. The access to the beach is great! Literally just a few steps and your feet are in the sand!! I can't really speak to the continental breakfast because we got downstairs at 9:15 to get some coffee and they had already taken everything up (including the coffee). But when we checked in the desk manager was clear to say it was a very basic breakfast with pop tarts and granola bars and such. And there are no coffee makers in the room so if you want coffee, be sure to get down there by 9am! All in all, we were very pleased with our stay for what we paid. Although I don't know that I would have been had I paid the regular price of $129.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, staff was very accomodating.”
Reviews.Author: KrsnaGainesville
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here after a wonderful spiritual festival on the Boardwalk, called Jagannatha Ratha-Yatra, where the God known as Krsna comes out to show His smiling face to all who are having fun on the beach and give others an opportunity to see how beautiful and sweet He is. We planned on staying 1 night, but since the festivities went late, we checked in late and were planning to check out late the next day. Ilene was really helpful in checking us in late. Jen, the front desk staff, and Bradley, the manager, were kind enough to give us a great price for a late checkout. They were kind to us and worked with our family to make sure we got our needs met in having a great family vacation. So we stayed another night! It is located right on the ocean, with a pool overlooking the waves crashing on the shore. Rooms are clean and the view is relaxing. Thanks Emerald Shores staff for facilitating a fun mini-vacation for us.

Reviews.Title: “Most enjoyable trip in a long time!”
Reviews.Author: Fallinoak
Reviews.Content: We loved this hotel. We were skeptical having made reservation without seeing hotel. Hotel was newer, and smaller but this made it great. We do not care to stay where there are alot of children around and this hotel was for us. Quiet, wonderful rooms, right on the beach, balcony was great and private which was important. We also had the room on the corner which had the balcony oceanfront PLUS a north facing window which was wonderful! Views were great, kitchenette was great, facilities and beds very nice, comfortable. We always bring our own pillows in case we need them but we did not. A/C worked beautifully. Our whole anniversary weekend was very relaxing and enjoyable and this was a wonderful hotel. We will book here again and tell our friends and family about it. Well worth the trip!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: Daytonabeach32
Reviews.Content: Disappointed with Emerald shores We came to Florida to enjoy the Ocean and get some very much needed relaxation. Since I suffer from allergies, I have to be careful to avoid some many things like mold, dust and a multitude of other airborne allergens. I read the reviews about how clean the hotel was, so we made the reservation and here we are in a room that faces the parking lot and is the most depressing, smelly and hot room available. There is not even a window that will open. They gave us a hand out that stated that they have gone green with motion sensors in the room and when there is no motion in the room the AC stops working. I assume if we don’t walk around the room tonight it will shut down when we try to sleep. Did I mention the mold in the dark hot and dirty bathroom? I am loaded with allergy meds, and I still can’t breathe in this most depressing room. Part of the room has a lowered ceiling that is barely 7 foot , and at the head of the bed on the other side of the wall is the elevator shaft that moves up and down constantly. When we checked in the clerk was very friendly and told us that on the eighth floor we would have a lovely view. Poor women, does she consider the parking lot lovely?? If I can survive this night, I am out of this horrible place in the early morning. Mean while, I am stuck here and must drive down to the that near by Public to Purchase cleaning supplies. May 30th, 2011. That youtube video is nothing like this room. Friendly staff yes. Clean room NO.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Friendly, Very Relaxed Atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: gchop
Reviews.Content: We just got back from a two night stay. Took one of the rooms with a 2-burner stove and refrigerator. We cooked all our favorite meals and ate all them on a table overlooking the ocean. Great way to spend our anniversary. We did a little side trip to Ponce Inlet (a few minutes away) where my husband surfed and I walked in the crystal clear water. It was the most relaxing, refreshing vacation I have had in years. The staff was friendly and helpful, we asked if we could put up an umbrella in one of the tables around the pool, and in 5 minutes, they had their own umbrella up over our pool table. May is a great month to go! not too hot and not too cold.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: mellam20
Reviews.Content: Very nice, clean and relaxing. It's a barebone, no frills hotel (no onsite restaurant/tiki bar/gift shop, small pool) but would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good clean basic family place”
Reviews.Author: family155032
Reviews.Content: Traveled with two teens Liked this place Price was right, place was clean, close to Daytona center, but not too close Close to shops, groceries kitchenette very much appreciated so no need to go out to restaurants greeeeeeeat view easy access to Beach The walls were not soundproof, but normal for apartment/ hotel level Not too big, (some big resorts seemed too big and congested at the elevators) good basic amenities, well maintained and fresh looking Would easily stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Spend the extra money and stay at another hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: carrma75
Reviews.Content: The hotel's air conditioner was so bad that everyday my boyfriend and I woke up with a headache. We were staying with a group for a wedding party and I later found out that everyone felt ill in the mornings. Once I figured this out, I realized that it was the air conditioner. I took a closer look at it and it was the most disgusting thing I have ever seen. I took pictures and emailed them to the hotel in order to discuss this issues, but never got a reply. Obviously my continued bi-monthly beach visits are not important enough for us to maintain a business relationship. I could take the horrible bedding, deal with the paint issues, and handle the mold smell, simply because it's an older hotel and on the beach. Not cleaning an air conditioning unit is unforgivable, especially since when I asked for a later check out in order to enjoy the beach they wanted me to pay a maintenance fee! Spend a little extra and go somewhere where you can breathe. I also sent them an email about my stay and did not get a response.

Reviews.Title: “Heated Pool yes, but not turned on”
Reviews.Author: Nothingbutcheer
Reviews.Content: We just completed a 3 day stay at this hotel with the thought of being able to spend time relaxing in their well advertised heated pool. The first night we were there there was a very large group that essentially took over the pool so we did not get a chance to use the pool until the next day and found it to be very cold. I brought this to the attention of the front desk who told us "pilot light must be out" and said they would check into it but the the pool never got any warmer. The hot tub, on the other hand, was nearly scalding hot. There were not many guests in the hotel after the first night so I suspect they were trying to save $$$ by not heating the pool. There was no letter from the manager in our room asking to contact him if there was a problem.
