The kitchenette was very basic (there was no skillet when we checked in) but otherwise a nice room for the price. I would only recommend this for a summer time stay.

Reviews.Title: “Still waiting on them to make it right!!”
Reviews.Author: kycop604
Reviews.Content: Booked a stay at this hotel When it first opened. Was exited to stay in a new place and would have been one if the first guests to have ever stayed there. Well, left to go on vacation and received a call from my mother-in-law that the hotel had called saying it was not ready and for us to call. Well, totally going crazy since we were to check I'm when we got there, we called. The guy, who stated he was the owner, talked to us and apologized stating that he had booked us at another place that he guaranteed us to like. For our inconvenience he was going to send us a free 3 day and 2 night stay for a future trip. Sounded good! Well, we got to the other hotel and it was a mom and pop place that was one level!! Not satisfactory!! Made contact back with "the owner" and told him of our dissatisfaction. Met with him and discussed details of getting my $$$ back! He agreed and we went to Tropical Winds and stayed. Was told we would still get the free stay ( 3 days and 2 nights ). Took 5 days for my money to be credited back to my card but it's been several years now and I have still not got the free stay!! Have not stayed there and would not!! Do not like being lied too!! Still waiting on the place/owners to keep their word!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: sadowss
Reviews.Content: Bradley made our stay, super great, he went out of his way to help. This was a great stay for our family, the rooms were large,and clean at reasonable. Thanks to Kimberly too for keeping us tidy. This hotel is located minutes from popular Daytona Beach attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Slamming doors, no vacant pool chairs”
Reviews.Author: Celegra
Reviews.Content: Just returned from my stay at Emerald shores. Upon arrival the people at guest services were very nice and welcoming. The rooms were ok, they were clean however very small and needed updated. Our refrigerator wasn't working when we arrived but was replaced with a working one, as soon as the order was placed. I did not like how the beds were located right at the doors. The noise of slamming doors at night and early morning did not make for a good nights sleep. We were out of the room early in the morning and was disappointed to see that all of the pool chairs were already reserved by towels and other personal belongings however no one was at the pool. I have stayed at other places before that did not allow you to "reserve" chairs. If you were not at the pool or in your chair your belongings were removed. I liked this policy because it cut down on chairs being taken but not used. During my entire 3 day stay I was not Ablento find a spot by the pool until around 5 o'clock in the afternoon after the shade already covered the pool. The hotel definitely needs to add a fitness facility.

Reviews.Title: “Everyone I met while there, both other guests and employees were wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: pensky46
Reviews.Content: My teenage grandson and I stayed at the hotel for 3 nights while in Daytona Beach. The room was very clean, all the staff very helpful and friendly and even the other guests were friendly!! We definitely will stay there again......great location, close to restaurants as well as several activities in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Less than expected...very disappointed”
Reviews.Author: ZetaMom
Reviews.Content: Although the price was reasonable (made through an independent booking site when the hotel would not match advertised rates from said site) and allowed us to stay a little longer to enjoy the fabulous weather, the experience overall was not what we hoped for, based on previous reviews. The facility was very basic with few amenities, i.e. no guest laundry facilities. The staff exercised little or no control over guests whose behavior would be considered at least, rude, and in some cases dangerous. Sadly, not someplace we will visit again.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous”
Reviews.Author: ibmomx2
Reviews.Content: Our spring break vacation was awesome. Donna Defeis our housekeeper was perfect. Always a smile and willing to help. The person that booked our reservations Bradley, was so helpful and polite, and filled every request asked for. I would definately recomment this hotel, and would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Beware!!!”
Reviews.Author: kathya911
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Emerald Shores hotel - checking in on a Sunday... when we arrived we were told our room wasn't ready yet - (check in is at 3pm and we arrived approx 3:15 pm). Luckily for us we arrived before a crowd of other travelers and our room was ready within about 15 - 20 minutes. As others came in behind us the line grew quite long of folks who had to wait for their room to be cleaned. This didn't stop here. We had maid service on Monday and Tuesday - although not until late in the afternoon. On Wednesday, we came back to our room around 5ish after being out all day at the beach etc. Our room had not had maid service. When we called the desk we were told that they had all gone for the day but they could send us up some clean towels, which they did. Then on Thursday - we were out at the beach all day. Upon arriving back in our room around 4:30 - again it had not been cleaned. We called the desk and were told they would get to us in about 1 hour. We were ready to shower, etc, so we just asked for clean towels again. We were told to come down and get them. Needless to say - maid service two days out of 4 was not satisfactory to us!!! Perhaps the hotel needs to increase their maid staff to be able to keep up.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel With Staff Who Care”
Reviews.Author: Educator
Reviews.Content: Went for 5 days over Spring Break. Was not sure what to expect from a hotel on the beach at such great rates. Very pleasantly surprised by desk staff, and even the cleaning people who seemed to understand the concept of customer service! Ocean side kitchen effeciency is worth a little extra b/c fantastic views and ocean sounds from our balcony, and convenience of Publix grocery store 1/4 mile south on same road. Heated pool was clean and actually warm enough - spa kept clean, even with a heavy work out by college breakers. Pool not overly chlorinated b/c also use salt system? One room was next to twin elevators but very quiet with no annoying chiming or machine sounds going all night. Simple breakfast bars, OJ and coffee in AM included. Mike's Galley 1/4 mile North has great Eggs Benedict for less $ than local IHOP. Sometimes you can still find one of the hidden gems of a deal and hotel...Emerald Shores is for real a Trip Advisor people kind of place, but they are getting full occupancies, and no doubt may raise prices...Rent some beachside chairs and umbrella from gentleman who sets up truck on beach in front of Shores Resort (200m South on beach) and he will set up and take down 8am to around 6 pm your own personal spot on the beach...plus, he gives all his tips to the college bound kids he employs. Open narrow band wifi gets a little overloaded during peak times, signal broadcasts from poolside so can get on the beach...a simple universal WEP key password would be a good idea to keep all the condo residents next door from freeloading.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: harleyrkc
Reviews.Content: Emerald Shores is an extremely clean hotel. The staff is great and always helpful. They do need to improve a very poor breakfast--it consists of a prewrapped bar or pastry and coffee. They would be better off just dropping the breakfast. The location is fantastic right on Daytona Beach and a very clean pool that overlooks the beach. I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great trip! Awesome Service!”
Reviews.Author: bredwards
Reviews.Content: The Emerald Shores Hotel was clean and neat! The management and staff was extremely helpful and flawless! I will no doubt be back!

Reviews.Title: “This staff really cares about their guests”
Reviews.Author: Dan00014
Reviews.Content: What an incredible week I had. The room was exceptionally clean, comfortable and quiet, and the hotel and grounds were well-kept. During Bike Week, one of the busiest, this staff bent over backwards to accomodate my changes in plans when I turned a 2-night stay into a 6-night stay. Everyone I came in contact with was helpful, but particularly Bradley, Kaelie and Jen. I shall return.

Reviews.Title: “9 out of 10”
Reviews.Author: Honeybun45
Reviews.Content: Very impressed! All the staff were friendly and helpful. Very clean. Nice size room .Great nights sleep. Beautiful location. We had balcony over beach and watched the sunrise-MAGICAL - certainly worth paying the extra for the view. Lovely swimming pool and jacuzzi. We only stayed here one night and wished it was longer. The breakfast could have been better but then for the price not that bad!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience and great value”
Reviews.Author: captainron8
Reviews.Content: Speed weeks are always tough on hotel employees and managment , Bradley Reising the general manager presented himself in a professional and courteous manner at all times as did his staff. My wife and I felt like family here. The facilities and grounds were clean and user friendly and it didn't hurt being on the worlds most famous beach either. I would recommend Emerald Shores Hotel and I plan on staying there in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect morning view”
Reviews.Author: justforfun4now
Reviews.Content: My friend and I ended our 10 day motorcycle trip here and it was a great way to finish. We'd toured from Clearwater to Key West to Daytona and after more than a week on the road it was a relief to have a clean, comforatable place to wind down. The moring view over the ocean is fantastic. I will definately stay again next time I'm in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Impressed”
Reviews.Author: WaltSob
Reviews.Content: The place was clean even the parking lot. Waiting for a cab we watched the manager picking up individual cigarette butts. The manager and staff were great, friendly and accomidating. The only issue we had with our stay was when we triied to order pizza from Papa Johns, Kids being foulish. Bradley, the manager, was always around taking care of bussiness and treating guests with personal hospitality. I and my 24 year old son were impressed so much that I had to take the time to write this review.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Holiday...We Will Be Back!!”
Reviews.Author: cccricket
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel from February 21 - February 25/ 2011 The staff were very friendly and extremely helpful. The room we had was a deluxe oceanfront suite, with full kitchen, that included a 2-burner stove-top, full size refrigerator and microwave. The housekeeping staff was very good, and we were given fresh towels everyday! The weather was perfect....so that helped cap off a wonderful holiday. The hotel has a heated pool, and a hot tub.....which was very clean....and the staff kept it clean everyday! We will definitely be coming back!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mamamonget
Reviews.Content: Kaelie, the desk clerk who checked us in was very courteous, efficient, and friendly. The lobbty was cheery and clean. The room was clean, roomy, and had a wonderful view of the ocean. The bed was excellent. It was a most enjoyable, but too short, stay. I would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Blue ocean, white sand and sunshine-am I dreaming?”
Reviews.Author: windsorsue
Reviews.Content: The staff at Emerald Shores Hotel are the best ( everyone from the handyman to the desk). Donna was our houskeeper and she could not do enough to please us during our stay. She was definitely number one in our books. Our bedding was changed regularly, even the bed spread, the windows were cleaned, the furniture was dusted, dish soap and washroom finge benefits were always provided, towels were folded like fans, even the toilet paper was folded at the end. Donna did so much more and her smile, personality and helpfulness made our vacation just perfect. The morning snacks were nutritional and coffee was always plentiful. A party room was provided for us to play games and converse with friends. The pool area is paradise. We will definately return to Emerald Shores Hotel in Daytona Beach, Florida. Thank you for all your great services.

Reviews.Title: “Still one of the best!!!”
Reviews.Author: Beachfix
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have been staying here since they opened. My last visit was a great suprise, the hotel has been freshly rennovated. the staff is first class,and most have been there since they opened about 5-6 years ago. the appearance of the hotel is clean clean clean!!! A great place to stay where the staff remembers who you are, and does not act like you are disturbing them. The management and staff could give lessons to other hotels on proper guest treatment.

Reviews.Title: “all great except for breakfast”
Reviews.Author: sunbeachoceanlover
Reviews.Content: All was great except we expected breakfast as advertised by the hotel. Unfortunatelly there was not breakfast only some bad granola bars. I suggest to managemet adding at least cereal, milk , danishes, tea, pancakes,some fruit. Then will be really great . Sun lover

Reviews.Title: “Great Holiday”
Reviews.Author: topsy97
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from an enjoyable 6 weeks at the Shores. Everyone treats you with respect and kindness. Bradley manages the hotel and greets each guest personally. The girls on the desk_Diane, Marcea, Eileen, and Kaelie are always cheerful and helpful. Our room was well done by Donna and the head housekeeper_ Kim_ was a joy. We can't wait to return!

Reviews.Title: “Big room, great view, bad breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Jessica022
Reviews.Content: I started my vacation at the Days Inn, but because they scheduled construction - non-stop jack-hammering - I relocated to the Emerald Shores. This was a great hotel, with a big room/big bathroom and very affordable rates. Also the balcony views were wonderful. I only had two complaints. First, the wifi went down two days in a row and both days the staff couldn't fix the problem. One staff was surprised to hear the hotel even had wifi. Second, they offered continental breakfast, but it was only coffee and OJ and very bad breakfast bars, that's it! No danish, no cereal, not even a banana. Also, there is no coffee maker in the room so you have to go downstairs for very watery coffee.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at a great price”
Reviews.Author: DCN2
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had a great stay at Emerald Shores. We were looking for a hotel right on the beach and with a great view in a quiet part of the Daytona Beach area, and this hotel really delivered. We relied heavily on Tripadvisor reviews when deciding on which hotel to book. For a budget motel, we were very pleased. Our room was clean and quiet, the staff was attentive but not annoying, and the bed was comfortable. The linens are decent but not top of the line and the paper products are what you would expect from a hotel in this price range. As others have noted, the continental breakfast consists only of pop tarts, granola bars, orange juice, and coffee. We look forward to returning in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Best on Daytona!!”
Reviews.Author: gus333
Reviews.Content: Best hotel on Daytona Beach! Bradley is a true manager that knows how to manage and take care of customers. (a rare commodity) We will return!

Reviews.Title: “"Worth A Return Visit"”
Reviews.Author: MrTape
Reviews.Content: With so many hotels available this time of year on the Daytona Strip it’s rather a roll of the dice when it comes time to choose the right one. We picked the Emerald Shores based upon their website and mostly positive reviews. I found the following exceptionally favorable: 1) Price 2) Staff 3) Lodging Upon arriving, my family found the staff exceptionally polite and courteous. Our room was on the 4th floor with balcony facing the ocean. Our air conditioned room was fairly modern and clean with (2) queen size beds, microwave, small refrigerator and TV. Located between the rear of the hotel and the ocean was a very clean and well maintained in ground pool along with a heated Jacuzzi. Daily housekeeping by in house staff proved to be exceptional. I had read that some reviewers encountered smelly rooms and rude staff to which I experienced none of either. Plenty of easy on site parking made this hotel choice that much easier. I will definitely return and ask you to do the same.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable and clean with private oceanfront balcony”
Reviews.Author: homebody2001
Reviews.Content: Great hotel if you want to be right on the beach with a private balcony. It is clean, but no frills. Don't count on anything for breakfast other than coffee. The granola bars and poptarts are great for the kids, but at these prices, I didn't mind going out to breakfast each day . There are 2 elevators and we never had to wait more than 10 seconds for one - but the hotel wasnt full either. The hot tub wasnt and the pool was "refreshing" to say the least. It would have been nice if the water in either was warm. Parking was great - lots of spaces and good if you are hauling a trailer. There are pull thru spaces without barriers. There is a Pubix grocery store close by and a wonderful Italian restaurant within 2 miles - Milanos. They have great pizza. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “I think this Hotel is the friendliest and cleanest hotel on the strip we loved it!”
Reviews.Author: nneese
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay. Was so relaxing to sit on the balcony and watch the ocean and look over the beach. The room was so clean and nice and the staff was so helpful and friendly Kaelie and and Brad were wonderful in helping with directions and giving advise on places to eat and even helped us in finding a place to rent a wheelchair. They were wonderful and that made our stay even better.

Reviews.Title: “Def. the best value, location and accommodation.”
Reviews.Author: NeedabeachFIX228
Reviews.Content: I found Emerald Shores on Trip Advisor, then went to the hotel's own website. I had not been to Daytona in 30 years and did not know where to stay. Emerald Shores had very straight forward website and sufficient photos and information. What won me over was the rate for an Oceanfront efficiency. I liked the fact that this is a smaller hotel and is operated by the owner who really cares about his establishment. This is one of the newer hotels and is very clean. We were very pleased with our room which was perfect and the beds were very comfy. The staff on all shifts were very friendly and informative. This will be our place to stay for any future visits to Daytona and we will def. recommend to others!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: pfrenzel
Reviews.Content: Just came back from the Emerald Shores. What a great hotel. When we got thier we had a river view, we wanted a ocean view so we upgraded with no problem. Any questions we had the front desk answered & helped us. The ordered cabs gave us suggetions on where to eat & what to do. The whole staff was completely friendly Especially Kayelie . She was great & we would definately come back just to see her.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay - Kaelie Rocks!”
Reviews.Author: sharont3k
Reviews.Content: We always stay at the Emerald Shores when we go over to the beach - Kaelie at the front desk is awesome!

Reviews.Title: “Emerald Gem”
Reviews.Author: azrak2000
Reviews.Content: My husband and I love the Daytona Shores area and have returned to the Emerald Shores Hotel for several years while traveling along the east coast. This small privately owned oceanfront hotel is intimate and more reminiscent of a European boutique-style hotel. The oceanfront rooms are spacious with mini-kitchens and nice private patios. There is a game room for and comfortable sitting area for adults.The lobby is always sparkly clean as are pool and jacuzzi area and the property is smoke-free which is a plus for us! It is especially nice to find a place where everyone on the staff treats guests in a friendly and personal manner-from front desk to housekeeping to manager and even the owner,Phil. The new manager Bradley is eager to please and ensure that guests are having 'fun' while continuing to make improvements as needed. While all of the staff members are friendly and accommodating I would especially like to thank KAELIE- a young, enthusiastic college student who has worked here over the years. KAELIE always welcomes us with a bright-eyed smile no matter how late at night we arrive. She is a great conversationalist and she is always there to answer questions, make suggestions about the area, and satisfy every need of every guest. Kaelie has a special spark and she takes a personal interest and responsibility ensuring that everyone is comfortable and happy! My husband and I travel a lot so we look forward to coming here and being treated with that personal touch rather than matter-of-factly as just another tourist as in many chain hotels. We sometimes feel like this is our 'home away from home'. Areas for improvement: Internet is often slow and it would be helpful to add a small business center or place for guests to have access to a printer. Labor Day weekend was a full house and we could not get a parking space in the main lot because some people came with more than one car. While there is an annex across the street we were hesitant to park there because we had a bike on the roof. Some hotels give parking passes and perhaps this would be a good plan on crowded weekends so that each room gets one pass for the main parking lot and the second or third car uses the annex.

Reviews.Title: “Beds hard as a rock!!”
Reviews.Author: rothmnfl
Reviews.Content: When I first got to our room, I was disgusted at the lack of decor and the color of the curtains. NEEDS UPDATING. However, the rooms were huge and the bathroom REALLY HUGE. Minimal cutlery so bring more and there are no measuring cups or pitchers or strainers. Don't burn your food because there are no vents etc. in the kitchen by the stove. There was a coffee maker way up high but coffee is not provided at all. Very little counter space at all, esp. to do dishes on. The shower head was in terrible shape and water came out slow. Toilet was great. Hot tub outstanding and so was the pool. They add chemicals often! Hotel is very close to water edge so that is huge plus. Breakfast was very cheap, breakfast bars and such from Walmart. Breakfast is only from 7-9AM as well. Internet connection is rotten unless you go down to lobby. It's so so if you use the internet when everyone is outside in the sun, but then you miss out. Night time is the worst. If you have a job and need good internet service, this place is not for you. Try the Acapulco Hotel for that if you can stand dirty pools and gross hot tubs : ) Oh, the parking is free and that is a huge plus. No bible or phone books in the rooms either. The beds are not comfortable and the desk person told us they tidy up the beds for you but DO NOT CHANGE SHEETS before the 3rd day, per law. Whatever that means! They did vacuum and give clean towels. If you want pool towels you have to get them from the front desk which sucks. There is no staff there at night really, just a desk lady. That air conditioner only comes on with someone in the room and it was hot and stuff in there when we got there. It regulates on the wall and comes out by the sliding glass doors the usual way. It blew the curtains out and that kind of bothered us. The rooms facing the ocean have a great view of pool. Nice patio area and there are like 7 or 8 steps DOWN to get to the ocean. The ocean had tons of shells and seaweed so be aware and know that you WILL step on something scary.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: csgraham29
Reviews.Content: Overall the experience was a good one. This hotel does need a face lift, as it is showing its age. Though it does have many pros. It's right on the ocean and rooms can be obtained for a fairly reasonable price. We got an oceanfront room for three nights at a rate of $66 a night after the hotel staff gave us one night free by matching an online offer. I thoroughly enjoyed sitting on the balcony and listening to the waves. The beach was easily accessible and there were very few people, making it enjoyable. It does have cons too though. The continental breakfast is rather poor. It consists of orange juice and pop tarts. The bathroom was dirty (hairs all over the place) and condensation from the air conditioning unit was causing moss to grow on the balcony. Also my wife came away with a few bites on her legs. Not sure if it was bedbugs. We inspected the room but didn't see any and I didn't have any bites. Also, the hallways got loud with people slamming doors. It was a nice hotel for the price. I will recommend it to friends but tell them to proceed with caution. I only went there to appease the in-laws, who wanted a cheap hotel. I will probably look for another one in the future that offers more amenities and is more up-to-date.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful service, great room”
Reviews.Author: gail03
Reviews.Content: We booked a night at the Emerald Shores Hotel to celebrate our 22nd anniversary. This is a nice property with wonderful service. From the manager to housekeeping, the staff made our stay very enjoyable. Our room was spacious and the ocean view was great; big bathrooms and comfortable bed; nice pool and quiet beach. The provided breakfast (packaged breakfast pastries and coffee) did not appeal to us, so we did a grocery store run (just blocks away) to stock the kitchenette and had breakfast in the room. We enjoyed dinner at a restaurant recommended by the manager. We will stay here again and recommend this property to family and firends. Great value for the spacious rooms, kitchenette, view and location.

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel good service”
Reviews.Author: marleneh1
Reviews.Content: If you don't reserve an oceanfront room there is no balcony. we ere not aware of that when we booked. I would definitely go back but make sure I had an oceanfront room with a balcony. The pool and the beach was great.. There was one employee, Donna who was particularly helpful and very friendly and kind to our 8 year old granddaughter.

Reviews.Title: “Was very pleased to stay here...”
Reviews.Author: Trina1171
Reviews.Content: Was having a great time! As GM Bradley told - "we do not have anything fancy or a restaurant, but we have clean rooms....." - so true.... I had an air purifier with me because of my son allergy issues - and did not have to use it. My room fairies Lubov and Valentina made my staying enjoyable.... The location is great, the rooms are spacious enough, kitchenette and fridge really helped to spare the commuting time to the restaurants.... I have met some returned customers - so I guess I would be on of them....

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: superstar904
Reviews.Content: We got a great deal on our stay at Emerald Shores through Hotels.com. We paid for two nights at $89 and got the 3rd night free AND we got two free tickets to Daytona Lagoon Waterpark. I will say that this is NOT a luxury hotel. You only get the basics. Shampoo and soap, but no conditioner or lotion...basic things you'd expect to be provided. However, the employees more than made up for it with their friendliness! The continental breakfast was coffee and poptarts. It was overall a great place. I would just suggest they spend just a little bit more to have a decent continental breakfast and toiletries in the room. I will go back and I do recommend this location. I'll just be packing my own conditioner and lotion.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing, Incredibile! My new home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: Scarlet307
Reviews.Content: I was so impressed with the staff at the Emerald Shores. I had a bit of trouble with the booking agents that I booked my trip through and I was so thrilled that the manager of the Emerald Shores, Bradley Reising, met me at the door after I checked in, walked me and my bags to my room and told me that he had called the booking agents himself and got my problem resolved! I was so amazed that he would do something like that for me! They go out of their way to help and assist you in any way they can and to make you feel comfortable. Diane at the fromt desk was great too. Always very helpful and polite. The room looks just like on the internet. Very clean and spacious. The Pool was always sparkling clean. I have nothing but rave reviews for the Emerald ! I won't stay anywhere else when I come to Daytona. Thanks again Bradley, Diane and staff. We had a great time!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Pat A
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Emerald Shores Hotel for three weeks from July 13 to August 1. The room was clean and the view was absolutely amazing. The manager strives to please his guests. He is very personable and constantly inquires as to how things are going. The entire staff were always courteous and very on top of things from making sure guests had what they needed to seeing that people that didn't belong at the pool were kindly asked to leave. I was very impressed. The location is very desirable as well as it is in a quieter section so there was never trouble finding a great spot on the beach. I couldn't find a single thing wrong with this place. This is the first time I have stayed for more than a week down there and I had originally had another hotel booked for my last week just for a change of pace. However, once I was in my room at the Emerald Shores, I decided to stay there the last week as well and was quickly accomodated. I loved every minute of it and when I return to Daytona for future vacations I will definitely stay at the Emerald Shores again. Awesome hotel!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: mandpop
Reviews.Content: It wasperfect for what we were wanting and needing. We asked for a late check out and clean and the staff was more than accomodating.

Reviews.Title: “we had a great time”
Reviews.Author: HohenwaldBfamily
Reviews.Content: we got there on july 24th and left the 28th the hotel was great and the staff was friendly and tookcare of our needs......it was quiet and beauitful..........great place to stay with your family....

Reviews.Title: “Not the best in the business”
Reviews.Author: sssmmh
Reviews.Content: Very nice, friendly staff. Internet only worked in the tiny Lobby. Bathroom not very clean, ran out of toilet paper as there was only one roll in the room. breakfast consist of Walmart brand granola bars and generic pop tarts. Hugh hairballs in the pool. Key card didn't work at first, we had to go back and get a new one. Garbage can located near the elevator was over flowing the entire time we were there. Mattress Pad was torn in several places. Mattress slid 1/2 off the bed. Great green system where the air conditioner only comes on when someone is in the room, shuts off when doors open. Again, the staff made the visit bearable. Would not go back there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased”
Reviews.Author: ashleyhendrix
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel 2 times about 4 years apart. It is a great place! Staff is friendly and the room was very clean. We had no complaints at all. Our a/c wasn't blowing cold the first day and someone was there to change it no longer than 10 minutes after we reported it. The pool area was also very clean. It may not be the biggest hotel in Daytona but I'm sure it's one of the cleanest.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place Loved It!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: ron5762
Reviews.Content: we loved the place, great pool , great location, when we booked we had a street view room, but when we checked in the manager Bradley gave us a oceanfront room upgrade at no charge. very nice people there, will be coming back soon!!!!!!!:)

Reviews.Title: “Will definitely stay there again”
Reviews.Author: chopin333
Reviews.Content: As a solo traveler, I stayed at Emerald Shores for 3 nights. I was unfamiliar with the area and randomly picked this hotel as I was driving the strip. This is the newest hotel and the ocean is literally steps from the room. The ocean was very uncrowded and gorgeous. The rooms (oceanside) were large, clean, complete with kitchen, and affordable. However, what made my stay so pleasant was the staff. From the manager to the people at the front desk - they could NOT have been more pleasant and willing to do whatever it took to accommodate my needs. Next time I visit Daytona, Emerald Shores most definitely be my destination.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, clean, great vacation”
Reviews.Author: KNorm
Reviews.Content: My family and I went July, 2010. We were impressed. The rooms were clean and spacious. We had a great view of the ocean. If we needed additional towels, it was not a problem. The entire facility was very clean. The hotel does not have a bar or restaurant, but does offer a meager continental breakfast consisting of coffee, orange juice, honey buns and cereal bars. It would have been nice to have cereal and milk for the kids. On our last night, there was a power outage for about three hours. Many guests went down to the pool area while we stayed on the balcony and watched the ocean. Bradley, the hotel manager, walked on all nine floors to make sure everyone was okay and left glow sticks in the hallways so guests could see. Overall, we had a terrific experience and cannot wait to go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great oceanfront property & reasonably priced!"”
Reviews.Author: mcgregor449
Reviews.Content: Although the property is beginning to show age, it is well maintained & clean. The staff are friendly, courteous & very helpful. Kaelie, Eileen, Shannon & Frank will go out of their way to make sure that everything you need is provided. General Manager, Bradley, is very personable & pleasant and tries to make sure that your stay is a comfortable home away from home...he is very positive & generates enthusiasm among his employees.

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL”
Reviews.Author: abcdefg55229
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean. All the staff were beyond friendly. We booked due to other's reviews and so glad that we did. Everything about this hotel was great!!! Can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “BEST VALUE IN DAYTONA BEACH”
Reviews.Author: Ron003
Reviews.Content: This hotel with it's GM, Bradley is by far the best value in Daytona Beach. I checked dozens of hotels and this one was not only the best value, it's location was great, the rooms were clean and the service was great. You feel like you are staying with family. The downside is the free breakfast that consists of snack cakes (which the kids loved) and one of the front desk agents was not as friendly (one out of 5 aint bad). I normally do not waste my time with a review, but this one I felt compelled to do. If it was not for the courtesy and professional attitiude of the GM, we probably would not have stayed here. We are greatful that we did. Unfortunately, it may be a bit harder to get a room there in the future as this well kept secret is no longer a secret.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Beach Views-Quiet-Not too Crowded!”
Reviews.Author: bmx2010
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Emerald Shores for my honeymoon. I was looking for a hotel that was directly on the beach, had a private balcony, and free breakfast. We checked in and the older lady at the front desk was kind of rude to us only because she was "forced to work a 12 hour shift". she obviously doesn't enjoy her job. We got into our room and went straight out to the balcony. It was just gorgeous! And a good thing about the balcony is that you couldn't see your neighbors and they couldn't see you. The parking is free at the hotel but I wouldn't recommend walking to wherever you're wanting to go. It's a litle far, plus there are all kinds of people on the streets. But if you are driving to the "down town area be prepared to pay to park anywhere you go. The continental breakfast isn't good enough to wake up for. They have coffee, honeybuns, and some granola bars. We choose to go to IHOP which was basically just across the street. The people there are wonderful and one nice waiter named Justin even drew us a map of where all we wanted to go. The beaches aren't too crowded in front of this hotel at all which was a huge plus for me. I'm used to the gulf not the atlantic and it suprised me to see people driving on the beach, but yes they can do that here, but it's not busy like you might think. Over all it was a great place to stay. I'm sure if I go back to Daytona Beach I'll stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place right on the beach.”
Reviews.Author: jlcarter1975
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our one night stay here before heading on up the road. It is right on the beach and has a pool oceanside too. The staff was very friendly. The breakfast only consisted of prepackaged breakfast foods and coffee. The pool also never closes as long as you are quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel; Amazing Staff”
Reviews.Author: HeatherD_10
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a week and it was awesome. No its not the Ritz but it is definately an amazing hotel for the money. The staff was incredibly nice too. They allowed us to up our room from a standard room to an oceanfront with a balcony with out any problems. Also because we had decided to go with out a rental car the manager was awesome and gave us contact information for a van as opposed to us taking a taxi or a bus around town. He also gave us a book about the city (which my boyfriend loved because he is a history buff) and tickets to the local baseball team. The room was clean, the air worked great, everyone was friendly and we didnt have a problem one at this hotel. I was a little leary after reading some of the previous reviews but this was an amazing stay and we are planning on going back next year! Thanks everyone at Emerald shores especially Bradley! You really made our trip amazing!

Reviews.Title: “Best View in the USA”
Reviews.Author: Mommy2boys1980
Reviews.Content: This was our first time to the Daytona area and my 3 year old's first time to the beach. We found this hotel on this website and it looked nice from the pictures and from all the reviews. Well when we got there it was even better. The view from our 7th floor room was spectacular!!! The room had a mini kitchen and was well cleaned! I couldn't imagine a nicer quieter place to stay for people with families. Although we didn't ever go in the pool (we were too busy on the beach), it looked nice and so did the jacuzzi. There were lots of people enjoying themselves in both so I am sure they were just as nice as the hotel itself. Emerald Shores is in the perfect location, it is close enough to all the hustle and bustle but far enough away that it doesn't disturb your family time! This may have been our first time, but we will be coming back every summer. My husband and I have already made that decision! Sincerely Cathie

Reviews.Title: “Gone downhill...but there's still hope!”
Reviews.Author: steve34609
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Emerald Shores several years ago,just after it was re-modelled,and we were very pleased. Since then,we have purchased three timeshares and have been using them to our great pleasure. I decided to treat my wife to a Mother's Day week-end on the beach.Emerald Shores had just sent us an e-mail offering a 30% discount so I booked a room. When we arrived we were pleased that,in addition to the discount,we had been given a complimentary upgrade to an oceanfront efficiency from a regular double queen room. Although we barely used the kitchen,the microwave was useful for our evening meal. During the afternoon of the first day we decided to use the deck at one of our timeshare properties in Daytona.The deck at Emerald Shores is very quiet with only a small pool and a jacuzzi. Emerald Shores is on a quieter part of the beach:great if this is what you want. While staying there,we noted a few problems.Just small maintenance issues.Broken towel rack over the toilet, walls that had not been patched or painted.Also, beware,there is a $10 charge if you stay in an efficiency and you do not clean up the dishes that you use when you depart.Strangely,no dishwasher detergent was provided us for cleaning up,so we used the bar soap from the bath. The BIG complaint that we had was that two patrons on the floor above us had booked rooms and crammed in eight people per room .They then proceeded to party until two oclock in the morning.I called the front desk and complained.The noise continued.I yelled at them from the balcony.The noise continued. Finally,management called in the sheriff.The "illicits" were removed,while those paying guests who invited them in were allowed to stay.I was told that they would be put on a list and not be allowed to return there as guests.I was also told that Emerald Shores does not rent to locals,in order to avoid such situations. My rebuttal is..."Why wasn't the front desk attendant more vigilant in order to prevent such situations,and to protect the interests of the legitimate guests who pay to have a peaceful time without ugly scenes?" There is only one way in and one way out of the hotel unless the "illicits" enter from the beach.No survellance cams, no electronic gates with pass keys.Easy to implement,but costly.I'm willing to give Emerald Shores one pass on this because it may have been an isolated incident.While we were staying there,we were told that they were at 35% occupancy.This may be normal for this time of year in this rather isolated part of Daytona Beach Shores.However,with the 30% discount...Maybe anyone is welcome. I truly hope not because Emerald Shores IS a degreee more classy than most of the other overpriced, oceanfront, mold-magnet hotels along this part of the beach. It is nicer and cleaner.I'd hate to see it just take the easy route and not put any money back into the operation. Bottom line: I DO rrecommend this hotel to others for the price and above average quality.Even though I did not get any sleep because of the partyers above us.

Reviews.Title: “had another fantastic stay at the emerald shores”
Reviews.Author: alyson27
Reviews.Content: just got back from another trip to emerald shores, from the hotel to theview from our room and the friendly staff we had another great vacation and we cant wait to go back. we have stayed several times at this hotel and every trip has been fantastic!!! brad is awesome and so is kaelie, (sp) we only stay at emerald shores when visiting daytona!!!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely the best place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Tiger9001
Reviews.Content: I was recently on vacation in Daytona Beach and stayed at the Emerald Shores hotel, it was the best hotel I have stayed at in Daytona in years. I traveled with my father and my 15 year old cousin, the hotel was perfect. It was clean and very modern being the newest in that area. The hotel staff was amazingly helpful and very polite. The manager Brad Reising was wonderful. He and his staff would routinely ask if there was anything we needed or anything that could be done better. I will definitely stay there again and would recommend this to everyone I know.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: scorpio1116
Reviews.Content: This hotel was on the beach and it looked exactly like the pics on the internet. I went during my spring break and loved it. I felt very welcomed. Kaelie was very nice at the front desk...i will come back and stay at this hotel!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Found a Place to Call Home”
Reviews.Author: lkevans7
Reviews.Content: I live in Orlando and have been staying in Daytona Beach every year for 45 years. After the hurricanes hit in 2004, I lost a place to call "home" in Daytona. After searching for more than a year, I discovered Emerald Shores and now it has become my beach vacation home!!!! The staff is friendly and helpful; the management is always accomodating. The hotel is clean, safe, and located a couple of miles away from the crowds that tend to gather in the heart of Daytona. We have celebrated birthdays here and had as many as 30 family and friends at one time without any problems or concerns. Whether you want to relax poolside or on the beach, read a book or throw a frisbee, check out Emerald Shores. It may be just what you are looking for!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for Relaxation”
Reviews.Author: ACR42
Reviews.Content: This is my third year at Emerald Shores, just 4.5 miles south of Daytona Beach in Daytona Beach Shores. From the very first discovery in '08 till today, I've found my month long stay, consistently relaxing, the staff friendly and helpful. Kaelie at the front desk on the evening shift is very personable and knowledgeable. Eileen and Shawna as well know how to deal with people and make every attempt to satisfy. Room service is consistent and complete. My stay covers both Spring Break and Easter (middle of March to middle of April) each year and room rates (for the month) can't be beat for this time of the year. My room faces due east and each sunrise is a spectacular event that beckons a long walk on the expansive beach. The location on South Atlantic Ave. is minutes from fine dining and attractions west in Port Orange or north to Daytona Beach. Being from New York, two of my favorite dining spots include "NY Style Bagels" down the street and "Luigi's Pizza & Restaurant on Clyde Morris" in Port Orange. Both owners are from NY and their bagels and pizza, respectively are right on the money.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: DirkNaste
Reviews.Content: Simple room but nice and clean. Kaelie at the front desk was very hospitable. Nice view of the ocean.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value, friendly, helpful staff, wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: bawstindad
Reviews.Content: We blew into Daytona Beach at the end of Spring Break, and booked the Emerald Shores through an aggregator on our way to visit family in the area. Realizing the potential for a clash between two peace-and-calm seeking adult travellers and a crowd of beer-soaked college-aged revellers, we were apprehensive when we pulled into the Emerald Shores driveway. Upon checking in, however, Kaelie immediately put our concerns to rest, moving us to an oceanview room for a nominal upgrade and settling us into a floor well away from the party crowd. The Emerald Shores was a great find. Clean, gorgeous views of the pounding surf, and quite a bit south on the beach from the cheap hotels and throbbing nightclub music that attracts the majority of spring breakers. The Emerald Shores had its share, but they stuck to the hot tub throughout the night and were no disruption. A word about the staff: Kaelie was incredibly accommodating and helpful, friendly and affable, but she wasn't alone in providing top-drawer customer service. We chatted with the GM after checking out to tell him how impressed we were, and he beamed like a proud parent who'd just received a compliment about his prodigal child. The Emerald Shores clearly has the right mix of friendliness and helpfulness, and combined with a great location and comfortable amenities, it's the kind of place we could easily envision returning to again and again.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE THIS HOTEL!!”
Reviews.Author: racermom05
Reviews.Content: Stayed 5 nights during Speedweeks and loved every minute of it. Front desk was helpful with getting extra blankets and anything else we needed. All the staff were extremely friendly. We will be back!! Little out of the way for nightlife or eating, but all are within a 10 minute drive.

Reviews.Title: “Only come here if you dont mind bad service.”
Reviews.Author: Lindsloo
Reviews.Content: The ladies at the front desk were very disrespectful. I have never been treated so poorly before. Continental breakfast consists of orange juice, coffee, and granola bars. They charge those whom are under 25 a deposit of 100 dollars per person but do not share that information beforehand. The cleaning woman tried to come into our room after hours for no reason : very suspicious. We had to hide our expensive things in the rent a car. There are no security cameras and teenagers were outside in the pool and hot tub until 2 am. I called the front desk to complain and they told me "I don't hear anything" rather than taking care of the problem. The area was nice and quiet and in a good location but me and my husband would never come back here again.

Reviews.Title: “This place has a fantastic staff and excellant customer service!!!”
Reviews.Author: cthurstin
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I were vacationing here for spring break. We drove through the night 16 hours and arived way before check in time. The front dest addendant ROSE immediatly checked us in! She was extremely kind and accomidating! She did not want us to sleep in the car until check in and gave us our room pronto. The location is great, ocean front, and the room is very spacious! Everything is neat and clean the bed is confortable and I could not ask for more!!

Reviews.Title: “Do it Again”
Reviews.Author: Moonshine10
Reviews.Content: This was the fourth time we have stayed at Emerald Shores. It gets better each time.The room is great and the staff are friendly. Kaelie was helpful and made us feel special.

Reviews.Title: “accommodating”
Reviews.Author: Payson_AzGram
Reviews.Content: When we arrived in Daytona for the Daytona 500 it was cold and rainy. We the rain did stop for the race, but the entire time there was terrible weather. The trip was salvaged by the service we received at the Emerald Shores. From the Mgr, Bradley Reising, to the desk personel (Kaelie in particular) to the housekeeper(Mesha) Due to the weather, we stayed at the Hotel a lot more than normal and the service was great

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: toptick
Reviews.Content: Everything needed, clean friendly convient,great value. Will return on next visit to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at a new hotel.”
Reviews.Author: traveler783
Reviews.Content: Came to Florida to escape the cold. Even though the weather was still chilly the stay was nice. Found this great hotel online and from the other reviews. We have stayed a number of places on the beach and this one is not run down. The staff was friendly and we couldn't find anything wrong with the room we had. The view of the ocean from the 8th floor was breathtaking. We would go back, just when it warms up.

Reviews.Title: “Emerald Shores is a great place to stay in Daytona!”
Reviews.Author: dickmontgomery
Reviews.Content: Hotel is clean and nice. Manager (Brad) is a class guy. Breakfast isn't much and receptionist isn't very friendly, but the place is still a favorite stop for us. We have stayed here 4 times and it continues to be clean, bright and comfortable. Rates are reasonable (except during Race Week) and I will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “The Georgia Gang”
Reviews.Author: StoneMountainSugars
Reviews.Content: Frank was very nice. This is a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: americanpatriot
Reviews.Content: The staff at Emerald Shores did everything possible to make our stay enjoyable. It is convenient to stores, activities and restaurants. The beach and pool are beautiful and it is not far from the speedway.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful stay at Emerald Shores”
Reviews.Author: WeLoveDaytona
Reviews.Content: We stay at the Emerald Shores hotel twice a month every month. We are impressed with the friendly, helpful staff especially Kaelie. She goes above and beyond her job duties to make each persons stay a good expierience. We will continue to come to the Emerald Shores twice a month and we stay a week at a time and i must say we always enjoy our selves at Emerald Shores !

Reviews.Title: “Daytona Shores's newest hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kentucky_Wildcat_NY
Reviews.Content: We stayed 8 nights in room 810 (river-view with a king bed). The views were spectacular and the room was large. My wife's parents stayed 5 nights in room 610 (river-view with a king bed. This room is smaller than 810 because of a cutout to accommodate the soda and ice machines in the hallway. Consequently, the bed is placed to close to the air-conditioner/heater. Avoid room 610 if others are available. The hotel advertises free breakfast, but it only danish, orange juice & coffee. The danish and orange juice were eliminated the 2nd day of our stay with apologies from the staff and never resumed! Fortunately there are many places to eat breakfast a very short drive away among them Denny's and IHop.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel With Great All Around Service, Cleanliness, Decor and Location”
Reviews.Author: SGSvrga
Reviews.Content: We stay at this hotel quite a lot when we come to Daytona, and I always recommend it. I love the reasonable prices for oceanfront, the pleasant decor colors, cleanliness and the willingness to work with customers to try to get them in a room with which they will be happy. The staff works with the guests to meet their needs and make the trip enjoyable, comfortable and accomodating. Any problems I've ever encountered with a room or something not working (which have been few), have always been handled quickly and properly to make my stay pleasant and enjoyable from the beginning. The view from all the oceanfront rooms is always like having the ocean in your front doorway and provides an incredible day as well as night view of the ocean. The city side views include the river and provide beautiful views also.The pool area is very convenient to the beach, just steps away, and is always kept clean. The hot tub is always working and clean as well. Towels are provided for the pool and the system to get them and return them is simple and efficient (they don't try to make you sign your life away to use towels). I'd recommend this hotel to anyone. Great staff and management!

Reviews.Title: “Ripped Off”
Reviews.Author: csc133
Reviews.Content: Stayed fall bike ralley. The place is over priced for a place that has far from nice rooms. Rooms were clean but not in very good shape. The second day we were there someone came in our room and stole $320.00 from my wifes purse while we were in the shower. One very brave sole!

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here because a clean lobby is not a clean room”
Reviews.Author: porko13
Reviews.Content: I spent 4 nights at this hotel this Sept. but it really wasn't worth the value. The staff didn't seem to care if I was there or not, even though the hotel was at less than one third occupancy. On my last night I had to ask the front desk for clean sheets(WTF) I am for saving energy but sheets need to be changed when they are SOILED. Housekeeping had not cleaned my room in the four days that I was there.....dumping the trash and putting out fresh towels is not cleaning the room. I don't think that there was even an attempt at vacuuming . If you stay at this hotel check your linens to make sure they are clean before you unpack. They cut to many corners to save a buck.

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel, great value, great view!”
Reviews.Author: b20afive
Reviews.Content: I traveled to Daytona Beach with a friend earlier this month and we chose the Emerald Shores Hotel as our destination. Saw the pictures online and made reservations. The front desk receptionist that was working that night (Rose) greeted us by name. I guess she knew who we were because of our very late arrival time. She was very informative and really sweet. The pool is always open, so is the hot tub. Plenty of space to walk about. The pool is kind of small, but deep. There's even a water hose provided to spray off the sand when you come back from the beach. Game room appeared to be nice. We stayed on the 5th floor, our room just happened to have a view of the drive-thru/drop off roof thing, it was kind of odd to look at but didn't bother us -- could have had an oceanfront room for a little more money, but we were on a budget. Rooms are actually really large, up to date. Digital thermostat and the air conditioner even has a motion detector, so it turns the air on or off depending if there's occupants in the room. Great if you come in from the water wet and don't want to freeze your butt off, and good energy conservation. Bathroom was absolutely spotless and a fun color. Shower was powerful and very hot, although the cold setting was the hot and vice versa. Oh well, big deal. Parking lot was full to the rim, the lot seems kind of small for the amount of rooms available, though we didn't have any issue finding spots. I'm sure we were lucky and got one of the last ones. For the hotel to be so crowded, it was very quiet, even during the day. Decided it was time for Steak and Shake at 3am, Rose directed us to the nearest one. She also offered extra towels for the pool in case we needed them. We were treated like family basically. Housekeeping did a great job of cleaning the room when we were on the beach. Continental breakfast wasn't available when I walked down to the lobby at 8:30 the next morning, but who cares, there's an IHOP down the street. Along with Publix and Walgreens and anything else you need. . The beach is very nice, however watch out for cars and stumble into a wooden speed limit sign in the middle of the dark like I did. This hotel was built in 2004 and it appears to have been well cared for since. I'd come back any day.

Reviews.Title: “As Daytona's newest hotel...”
Reviews.Author: thewalrus62
Reviews.Content: ...the Emerald Shores feels a bit like some of the area's older, more permanent fixtures, despite the glossy exterior. Though we found our 9th floor efficiency almost spotless (request the upper fringes if you want a quiet one folks, the pool area NEVER closes), we also encountered a long list of amenities that were curiously lacking. Our expansive room featured a private oceanfront view (breathtaking...definitely worth the extra $$$!), two queen beds, two burner cooktop, fridge and mini microwave...but no dishwasher. No dish drainer either. Having to wash and dry every cup and saucer by hand, using the already limited supply of bath towels, quickly proved a dull and tedious task. On the upside, the courteous staff did their best to accomodate us, and made sure we never in short supply of any daily necessities. Outside proved the biggest enigma, as an endless array of cigarette butts and plastic bags repeatedly found their way into the pool and spa area, not to mention an ever thickening layer of sand along the bottom of the pool. This, coupled with a greasy, murky film atop the water left us pondering the curious lack of exterior standards...strange considering the hotel's nearly flawless interior. No restaurant, no cafe or bar, no place for grilling despite a grassy, underdeveloped area on the north side of the complex...just a small, albeit sparkling lobby where a paltry continental breakfast is offered up each morning till 9am. And we musn't forget the rather limited game room through which you must enter from the pool area so as not to drip water along the lobby floor. (?!?) As our holiday was limited to only a quick weekend getaway, the Emerald Shores served our needs well. Next time however, given the host of options that mark the rapidly aging Daytona shoreline, we might opt for something slightly more accomodating, both outside AND in. Something more, perhaps, than merely a room with a view.

Reviews.Title: “Not too bad at all!!”
Reviews.Author: Dewtimes
Reviews.Content: First, let me say that I typically stay in mulit-bedroom timeshare units that are very nice. So when I booked this "promotional" stay at this hotel I was nevertheless going to be skeptical (regardless of what the pictures on the website looked like). I was pleasantly pleased!! The hotel had an appealing lobby with nice furniture, continental breakfast needs a little help, front desk staff were very friendly, pool / hot tub area was basic, access to the beach was excellent, location to attractions, restuarants, etc was good, housekeeping ladies were very accommadating and very friendly, rooms were more spacious than your average hotel room with one of our rooms having a refrig, stove, microwave, pots/pans, dishes, etc. The other room only had a smaller refrig and microwave. Be sure to ask for a room with the extra kitchen appliances. Ask for Beachfront...the "Riverfront" or "Intracoastal" view is not good at all. Definitely want a Beachfront room. The hotel is only 9 stories high, so ask for the highest floor for best view of the ocean and coastline. We were on the 8th floor and had a good view. Parking is very limited...if you are traveling with more than one vehicle (like us) you want to protect your parking spots as best as possible. Otherwise, if the lot gets full you have to park across the street (Atlantic Ave.) and the area is bloched with lower income looking people and houses. Overall...unless I was staying at the Wyndam OceanWalk Resort (where we are timeshare owners), this is not a bad option at all if you are looking for just a clean, fairly spacious place to lay your head and is right on the beach. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “loved the hotel..”
Reviews.Author: kimtoshab
Reviews.Content: I have read some of the reviews. There are do not disturb signs right on the inside of the doors. all you have to do is put it on the outside. also the comforter thing. is more like a cover on the bed. If you need blankets you can ask the housekeeping or front desk. they have plenty.. i saw them. also the pools get cleaned often i saw the spanish guy doing it. i enjoyed my stay very much. the housekeeping staff was very friendly and helpful. i had soap, shampoo,fluffy white towels,tissues, toilet paper, basically everything i needed. i also got a couple of gifts in my room over the time i stayed there. the housekeeping maintains the room everyday and i was happy to have my bed made when i came back from shopping or at the beach, or sometimes right after my breakfast. i had fun staying at emerald shores! i would recommend to anyone. :)

Reviews.Title: “Very enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: ifnot4grace31
Reviews.Content: The staff at the hotel were very nice. It was spring break for the college kids when we went. I thought this would be disastrous, but we were put on one of the top floors so we didn't have to hear any of what was going on. From what we heard the kids were very rowdy, but we didn't experience any of that because we were on the upper floor. I really appreciated that about the hotel. There is beach access right outside in the back, so this was a great location if you want direct access to the beach. This part of Daytona is very family friendly, so it was a rather quiet and peaceful location, which was what we wanted. There wasn't a lot of random foot traffic at all. The room was basic with a refrigerator. It met our needs - not particularly fancy, but not terrible at all. Overall, this was a nice stay at the Emerald Shores. I would definitely stay again if I were to return to Daytona. It's only an hour away from Orlando and St. Augustine, and only 15 min from the Ponce Inlet Lighthouse. We were in a great location.

Reviews.Title: “Deserves it middle ranking . . . just average”
Reviews.Author: JonaBrit26
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I went from March 19-23. We had an oceanfront efficiency on the 5th floor. The total for the four nights was $470. The beach is located in Daytona Beach Shores, south of Daytona. It's more quiet, not so many rowdy college kids. All rooms are non-smoking, but smoking is allowed on the OF balonies and pool deck. Drinking is allowed (no glass!) on the pool deck as well. As for the room, everything appeared clean. No mold anywhere but there was some staining on the carpets The beds were OK, only a sheet and thin "comforter" for blankets. There were four pillows to a bed which was nice. CONS: Cannot control the room temperature. They have something called a GEM system (or something like that) which controls the room temp for you. It also allows housekeeping to know if you are in your room or not. I would look it up (I don't know how common those things are, I wasn't comfortable not being allowed to control the temperature of my room considering the money I was paying. Housekeeping was SUPER friendly but unfortunately non of the rooms have a "DO NOT DISTURB" sign. You have to personally call down to the front desk and let them know you do not want to be disturbed, even if you do not want housekeeping. The hot tub smelled funky and appeared dirty but on the other hand, the pool was super clean. This hotel was very average. I would probably not stay here again due to the fact there are 45 other hotels in the area with better ratings. --We had a kitchen in our room which helped us save money but there are so many restaurants around not cooking wouldn't be a problem. There are two grocery stores within a mile of the hotel (I prefered PUBLIX, the ppl were a lot nicer and so was the store). Also there are literally fifty souvenir shops on South Atlantic Avenue (including swimwear). Last note, in Daytona Beach and Daytona Shores you are ALLOWED to drive your car on the beach so be careful if you have little ones. Any other questions, feel free to e-mail me at britt2684@yahoo.com.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Location, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: TheNeeces
Reviews.Content: We had an oceanview room at Emerald Shores. Hotel was nice enough and seemed clean enough, but could have used some dusting around furniture items and lamps. Hallways smelled a little musty. My husband was working at the Daytona 500 Event and we found the track easy to get to from the hotel. There was a grocery store down the street along with a Bank of America. Cars could drivie along the beach which was right outside the hotel. Hotel located on the beach side of the street. There were plenty of hotels along the beach (most with vacancy signs even during the Daytona 500) so plenty to choose from. After we booked this room, I kept watching the internet and the price actually came down by about $30 a night and when I called, they gave me the lower rate, Nice pool on the beach with plenty of chairs. There was a place to rent 4- wheelers and gators to ride along the beach. Restaurant down the street called The Ocean Deck that had a nice outdoor concert one night while we were there. Overall nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “Fire the houskeeper on floor 6 !!”
Reviews.Author: Oceanguy
Reviews.Content: Have stayed here in the past and just spent another nights stay on 10/26/08. Property has eight floors and the ocean view is beautiful !! Was given room 604 and upon opening the room door, I knew the housekeeping was lacking. Finger prints all over the glass doors and 12 moths on the walls and ceilings and a few dead ones on the floor. Bathroom appeared dirty. Called the front desk and was given room 701 much better and it even had a dehumidifer in it. The only negative was the bathroom had that smell as if the housekeeper was using a dirty rag that needed to be washed. Also, they do not provide blankets on the beds, just sheets and the bedspread. I would certainly stay again but would check the room prior to committing just to make sure it was cleaned correctly. Pools appeared clean and well maintained.

Reviews.Title: “Unfortunately, a Bad Experience!”
Reviews.Author: DYHFL
Reviews.Content: We planned to stay at this hotel 8/6/08 -8/9/08....we did not spend one night at this place!! It was filthy...the floors, the balcony, and even the a/c unit had dust, crumbs and/or beer bottle caps on it!! This was a resort style oceanfront room, so there was a fullsize fridge, a 2 burner stovetop and microwave. Unfortunately, they too were all dirty. My wife attempted to clean them with cleaning products we bought at the store!! Also, the cooking pans and utensils had dried food on them and the beds looked as if they had simply been remade and never changed..it was pretty bad. The front desk sent us "clean" pillow cases and pots and pans in a box! We packed up and left. This was not a case of being overly picky. These issues were very clear and obvious. We checked into the Hilton... we didn't have the kitchen, but the oceanfront room was immaculate with really great room service!

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful and Clean”
Reviews.Author: daytonohio123
Reviews.Content: What a grand stay we had. The staff and it's guest were so friendly,and helpful.The room was five star from clean to remarkable color picks on the walls,that just set the room for the best stay ever.You couldn't ask for more ! :) Big Thanks 2 U The view over the city is just as great as the ocean side....

Reviews.Title: “A very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rachel1919
Reviews.Content: One of the nicer hotels near Daytona Beach. I definitely recommend staying in Daytona Shores rather than picking a hotel near Daytona Beach and the pier. The reason why is because The Shores hotels seem to be newer and therefore cleaner plus the beaches are so much nicer. It is a short drive straight up Atlantic Av to get to Daytona Beach (less than 10 mins.) The beach outside Emerald Shores was amazing. The sand was like talcum powder and it was so clean and quiet. Many times we were the only people on the beach. The hotel is a newer hotel, I think it was built in 2004. Upon checking in everything was very nice and clean. The bathroom was spacious. The room had 2 queen beds that were very comfortable and the sheets were white and of a higher thread count. The TV had all the channels that I am used to at home. The room included a microwave and a minifridge, both were brand new. There was a sitting area with 2 chairs and a table. The hotel supplies you with soap, shampoo and conditioner from Bath & Body Works. We were on the 3rd floor and the view was excellent. The pool was heated and clean and the hot tub was nice as well. I loved that they allowed you to use the pool after dusk, most hotels won't. The staff was friendly and housekeeping was acceptable.The only thing that disturbed me was that when the lady came to make the beds she didn't bring new sheets she just remade the beds even if the sheets needed to be changed. The price of this room was $109.00 a night which I thought was pricey considering it was just a normal hotel room with 2 beds. If I was comparing it to other hotels I'd say is was more like a $79.00-$89.00 room. Please note that there are no laundry facilities and it costs .50 cents for each local phone call. Both of those things would have been nice to know ahead of time.

Reviews.Title: “We loved Emerald Shores”
Reviews.Author: PoopsieK
Reviews.Content: My husband & I are from Missouri and we drove into Daytona for the Turkey Rod Run over Thanksgiving. We walked into almost every hotel on the strip and Emerald Shores was the cleanest and most reasonable. We highly recommend this hotel and we ourselves, plan on returning next year. As long as they stay reasonably priced we will stay with them again. I can say that the other hotels in the area were price gouging becasue of the Turkey Rod Run, but not Emerald Shores. We got a great Ocean front room for a great price. Thank You Emerald for your integrity, honesty, and professionalism.

Reviews.Title: “very nice experience”
Reviews.Author: kkid14701
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time at The Emerald Shores! From the general manager through the entire staff, everyone was very friendly and professional. Our room was clean upon arrival and was maitained thoughout our stay. We would highly recommend this hotel as it is on the quiet end of the shores. We will return next fall!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: mpoff1
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Emerald Shores from July 2nd through July 9th and loved it! We were on our honeymoon and wanted to spend time on the beach. The oceanfront efficiency was great with two queen beds and a kitchen. The view of the ocean was amazing. It is at the quiet end of Daytona Beach Shores so the beach was not crowded at all. The staff were very friendly and accomodating. We decided to stay an extra night after the Pepsi 400 and they gave us a very good deal on the room for an extra day. We will definitely stay at the Emerald Shores whenever we are in Daytona again!

Reviews.Title: “Really bad in so many ways”
Reviews.Author: NOOPY
Reviews.Content: My mom and I are frequent visitors to the Daytona Beach Shores area. We generally stay at another hotel but decided to try the Emerald Shores because it was new. When I made my reservations I requested a room on the second floor as my elderly mother cannot ride elevators ( she was trapped in one many years ago) Upon our arrival I was told that they booked the first 4 floors with a family reunion. I explained that I had made my request months earlier and confirmed it 2 days before my arrival. I was told well we need the keep the family members together so all I have for you is a room on the fourth floor or above. I took it BUT It was very difficult for my mom. The hotel is new but poorly maintained. Bad smells in hallways and cheap decor in the rooms. We were on the 4th floor and could still hear people partying in the hot tub at 1:00 am in the morning. The balconies are lovely and the View spectacular! However because they are concrete and cave like you can hear people talking on the other balconies when your out on yours! Room was dirty and never cleaned well. We had someone else's hair in our room and on our bathroom floor for our ENTIRE 5 day stay even though I complained daily. Tub drained so SLOWLY ! One morning NO CLEANING was done. when I spoke to the desk at 11:00 Am they said that we were still in our room when the girl came around.... And now she was gone for the day ... she then stated that " most of our guests don't want their room cleaned everyday" Stay away from this place ! If you have a old favorite hotel in the area just go there. Make sure you look at my photos of this hotel for proof of the filth we encountered !

HotelInfo.Name: Emerald Shores Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 2613 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32127
